items.title: (Hamd Baari Ta'ala) Woh Yaktaa Hai Yagaana Hai Woh Har Aalam Ka Baani Hai
items.content:
Woh yaktaa hai yagaana hai woh har aalam ka baani hai
 Na koi uska humsar hai na koi uska saani hai

Bina uski ijazat ke koi patta nahi hilta
Woh tanha hai magar har shay pe uski hukmrani hai

Jab ambar dekhta hoon ghaur se hairaan hota hoon
Khala mein chand thehra hai ghata mein chhup ke paani hai

Kahin shaadaab hai duniya kahin sehra hi sehra hai
Kahin berang nazaara hai kahin dilkash rawaani hai

Woh khaaliq hai jahan bhar ka woh maalik hai jahan bhar ka
Wahi daata hai hum sab ka usi ki paasbaani hai

items.title: Teri Qudrat Daali Daali (Hamdiyya Nazm)
items.content:
Teri qudrat daali daali
Patta patta baali baali

Tere dam se roshan duniya
Tere dam se gulshan duniya

Mauj mein tere dam se rawaani
Tere dam se behta paani

Tera nahi hai saani koi
Tera nahi hai baani koi

Tu hai tanha yaktaa yagaana
Tere kun se saara zamaana

Tera jalwa zarra zarra
Darya darya sehra sehra

Sang tale bhi keere paale
Andhe saanp ko rozi daale

Tu hi awwal tu hi aakhir
Tu hi baatin tu hi zaahir

Teri sana se sab hain qaasir
Adna aala maahir shaa'ir

Dhadkan ki raftaar mein tu hai
Aadam ki guftaar mein tu hai

Sau baat ki ek baat hai Saani
Allah baaki sab hai faani

items.title: (Naat-e-Pakﷺ) Mahboob Jis Ko Ho Gayi Sunnat Rasool Ki
items.content:
Mahboob jis ko ho gayi sunnat Rasool ki
Is ko milegi khuld mein qurbat Rasool ki

Padhte darood paak hain hoor o malak sabhi
Aala hai sab se aala hai azmat Rasool ki

Qur'an mein aisa koi bhi paara nahi mila
Khud hi jo kar raha ho na midhat Rasool ki

Hazrat Bilal naazaan hain apne naseeb par
Karne lage hain jab se woh khidmat Rasool ki

Ungli ke ek ishaare par tukde hua qamar
Munkir yeh dekh kitni hai azmat Rasool ki

Bas woh hi muskuraayega mahshar mein dekhna
Aadat hai jis ko karni ita'at Rasool ki

Saani ke paas kuchh nahi neeki ke naam par
Kuchh hai agar toh woh hai mohabbat Rasool ki

items.title: (Naat-e-Pakﷺ) Jis Ka Bhi Muhammad Se Waasta Nahi Hoga
items.content:
Jis ka bhi Muhammad se waasta nahi hoga
Yeh samajh lo is ka toh kuchh bhala nahi hoga

Woh khada munaafiq ki saf mein hoga mahshar mein
Ishq jis ke seene mein aap ka nahi hoga

Khuld tak na pahunchega, chaahe woh koi bhi ho
Raah kamli waale ki gar chala nahi hoga

Hoga na Muhammad ka naam lewa gar koi
Yeh zameen falak kuchh bhi ba-Khuda nahi hoga

Patthrein bhi khaa kar ke jo duaayein deta ho
Ek siwaaye Ahmad ke doosra nahi hoga

Rab ke aage mahshar mein aap ke siwa bole
Aisa aur kisi ko bhi hausla nahi hoga

Naat-e-Pak padhte tum har ghadi raho Saani
Dekhna tumhaare saath kuchh bura nahi hoga

items.title: Ek Baar Mujhe Bhi Toh Taiba Ko Dikha De Rab
items.content:
Ek baar mujhe bhi toh Taiba ko dikha de Rab
Soi hai meri qismat qismat ko jaga de Rab

Duniya mein jahaalat ki chhaayi hai ghata har su
Ek noor ki badli ko aalam mein chala de Rab

Aasi hoon bahut lekin ummeed hai waabasta
Ahmad Mursil ke sadqe apni tu raza de Rab

Jab tu ne mujhe Aqa ki ummat mein kiya paida
Lahja bhi mera Aqa ke lahje se mila de Rab

Jis raah pe chalne se milti ho raza teri
Saani ko musafir tu us reh ka bana de Rab

items.title: Is Duniya Mein Tu Nahi Zinda, Ab Tanha Ghabraun Maan
items.content:
Is duniya mein tu nahi zinda, ab tanha ghabraun maan
Teri judayi ke gham se mein, kaise dil behlaun maan

Main na tujh se door hua jab, tu kyun mujh se door hui
Chhod ke mujh ko jaane par tu, kyun kar ke majboor hui
Yaad mein teri kitna royun, kaise tujhe bataun maan
Teri judayi ………………………………………

Tujh se bichhad ke kya kya dukhda, aye maan maine uthaaya hai
Thokar maari us ne mujh ko, jis ke jee mein aaya hai
Aaja aaja laut ke aaja, har dam tujh ko pukaarun maan
Teri judayi ………………………………………

Khwaabon mein hi aaja mere, jee bhar kar dekhun tujh ko
Rehta hoon be-chain bahut hi, kuchh toh mile raahat mujh ko
Is ke us ke jaise main bhi, naghma khushi ka gaun maan
Teri judayi ………………………………………

Pyaar se tera paas bulana, aur gale se laga lena
Phir chehre ke har hisse ko, khush ho kar bosa dena
Din woh bhulana chahun par ek, pal bhi bhulana paun maan
Teri judayi ………………………………………

Dekh ke mere maathe pe bal, haay woh tera tadap jaana
Mujh ko har pal yaad aata hai, ulfat ka woh zamaana
Koi nahi tera saani, tujh ko kahan se laun maan
Teri judayi ………………………………………

items.title: Rahzani Aane Lagi Jab Rahbaron Ke Darmiyaan
items.content:
Rahzani aane lagi jab rahbaron ke darmiyaan
Ek wehshat si hai taari qaflon ke darmiyaan

Reza reza is ko mere hauslon ne kar diya
Aagya patthar koi gar raaston ke darmiyaan

Dil duayein deta rehta har ghadi us shakhs ko
Jo lutaata rehta khushiyaan ghamzadon ke darmiyaan

Yeh samajh lo woh wali hai aaj ke is daur mein
Haq bayaani jo hai karta baatilon ke darmiyaan

Zulf-e-donta ko jhatak kar jab woh mehfil se gaye
Ek qayaamat si hai barpa aashiqon ke darmiyaan

Kis ko fursat hai yahan ab kaun haal-e-dil sune
Har koi uljha hua hai mas'alon ke darmiyaan

items.title: Agarcha Aarzoo Ho Yeh Ke Khud Ko Jaavedaan Kar Lein
items.content:
Agarcha aarzoo ho yeh ke khud ko jaavedaan kar lein
Raqam taareekh ke pannon pe apni dastaan kar lein

Ajal ke aye farishte aagya achha kiya lekin
“Ijazat de ke apni dastaan-e-gham bayaan kar lein”

Tamanna ab ujaale ki kahin se aur kya karna
Chalo roshan charaagh-e-dil jala ke khud jahaan kar lein

Koi madd-e-muqaabil phir na thehre baat pakki hai
Agarcha hausle ko khud hi apne kaarvaan kar lein

Tarannum se shehad tapke tahat se yeh faza mehke
Samajh mein sab ko aajaayegi gar Urdu zabaan kar lein

Na ho sharmindagi us din mile jis roz khud se hum
Bhalaayi ka koi bhi kaam aye Saani yahan kar lein

items.title: Jin Ka Parnoor Ibaadat Se Jigar Hota Hai
items.content:
Jin ka parnoor ibaadat se jigar hota hai
Aise logon ki duaon mein asar hota hai

Is zamaane mein bahut kam hi magar hota hai
Jaan dene ka bhi aashiq mein hunar hota hai

Le ke talwaar nikal padta hai ghaazi-e-waqt
Jab kisi pe bhi kahin zulm agar hota hai

Tum kabhi aa ke gale se bhi laga lo dilbar
Ab nahi khwaabon khayaalon se guzar hota hai

Fun jise aata hai auron ko dagha dene ka
Aaj kal chain se us ka hi basar hota hai

Aint patthar se faqat ghar nahi banta Saani
Mil ke rehte hain jahan sab wahi ghar hota hai

items.title: Isi Ke Ishq Ke Saanche Mein Dhal Raha Hoon Main
items.content:
Isi ke ishq ke saanche mein dhal raha hoon main
Isi ke waaste itna badal raha hoon main

Gunwa ke umr kisi be-wafa ki khaatir aaj
Na jaane kyun kaf-e-afsos mal raha hoon main

Qafas mein jaise parinda tadapta rehta hai
Kisi ki yaad mein aise machal raha hoon main

Mujhe sambhaal sako toh sambhaal lo aa kar
Khud hi mein barf ki tarah pighal raha hoon main

Abhi tujhe kahan ehsaas hai mere bache
Bala ki dhoop mein kyun kar ke jal raha hoon main

items.title: Roz Hi Haadsa Ban Ban Ke Mila Karti Hai
items.content:
Roz hi haadsa ban ban ke mila karti hai
Zindagi kis se yahan sach mein wafa karti hai

Raah-e-sunsaan se aati hain sadaayein mujh ko
Is liye rooh bhi be-chain raha karti hai

Tere aamad ke tasawwur se machal jaata hoon
“Dil ke darwaaze pe dastak si hua karti hai”

Woh meri shaan mera naaz meri jaan bhi hai
Iski soorat hai jo aankhon mein basa karti hai

Yeh mohabbat ki alaamat nahi toh phir kya hai
Raat bhar saath mere woh bhi jaga karti hai

Maut ka khauf kisi aur ko hoga Saani
Aashiqi maut se kab yaar dara karti hai

items.title: Aankhon Se Badgumaani Ka Chashma Utaar Dekh
items.content:
Aankhon se badgumaani ka chashma utaar dekh
Kitna hai teri yaad ka dil par ghubaar dekh

Teri toh koshishein rahin har dam rahe khizaan
Aa hi gayi chaman mein yeh aakhir bahaar dekh

Rangeen yeh jahaan tujhe aayega nazar
Ho kar kisi pe tu bhi toh dil se nisaar dekh

Dil ko lagaaya maine toh is mein ajab hai kya
Har ek ko kisi na kisi se hai pyar dekh

Acha nahi hoon tujh se bichhad kar main aaj kal
Haalat kabhi toh aa ke mere ghamgusaar dekh

items.title: Gham Ke Saagar Se Tu Nikaal Mujhe
items.content:
Gham ke saagar se tu nikaal mujhe
“Aaina phenk kar sambhaal mujhe”

Is ko dekha toh yeh kaha dil ne
Ab raha kuchh nahi malaal mujhe

Ab toh aathhon pehar sataata hai
Lamha lamha tera khayaal mujhe

Pehle sapne haseen dikhaaye phir
Dil ko toda kya nidhaal mujhe

Main toh mitti hoon chaak ki Saani
Jaisa chaahe toh waisa dhaal mujhe

items.title: Darindon Ki Himaayat Ho Rahi Hai
items.content:
Darindon ki himaayat ho rahi hai
Yeh kaisi ab siyaasat ho rahi hai

Jise sooli chadhaana chaahiye tha
Usi ki ab hifaazat ho rahi hai

Jahan beti hai Maryam aur Sita
Wahin paamaal ismat ho rahi hai

Bhala insaaf ab kaise milega
Bikao jab adaalat ho rahi hai

Kisi ko aaina jab se dikhaaya
Musiibat par musiibat ho rahi hai

Yeh kaisi ab taraqqi hum ne kar li
Bahut bimaar aadat ho rahi hai

Hifaazat ghar ki, Saani khud hi karna
Luteron ki hukoomat ho rahi hai

items.title: Jab Se Mujhko Tujh Se Ulfat Ho Gayi
items.content:
Jab se mujhko tujh se ulfat ho gayi
Tu hi meri har zaroorat ho gayi

Aap jab se door mujh se ho gaye
Har musiibat apni qismat ho gayi

Ek wehshi ho gaya hai paarsa
Is ko bhi shaayad mohabbat ho gayi

Khoon roti hai riaaya in dino
Zaalimon ki ab hukoomat ho gayi

Chhaayi rehti hai udaasi ghar mere
Jab se beti ghar se rukhsat ho gayi

Ek paagal ki tarah dekha mujhe
“Yeh na poocha kyun yeh haalat ho gayi”

Saani sooli pe chadhega ek din
Haq bayaani ki jo aadat ho gayi

items.title: Ishq Mein Jaan Nisaar Kaun Kare
items.content:
Ishq mein jaan nisaar kaun kare
Ab yahan sacha pyar kaun kare

Jo diya woh hai tohfa mausam ka
Ab khizaan ko bahaar kaun kare

Sab ko paise ki pad gayi chahat
Phool ka kaarobaar kaun kare

Aaj naqdi ka jab zamaana hai
Chahatein phir udhaar kaun kare

Jal rahi aag raah-e-ulfat mein
Dekhna hai ke paar kaun kare

Bas tera hi tera deewana hoon
Mujh ko apna shumaar kaun kare

Thak thaka kar kaha mere dil ne
Umar bhar intezaar kaun kare

Ishq sona hai aap kehte ho
“Aap ka aitbaar kaun kare”

items.title: Mujh Ko Hasrat Hai Use Dil Ke Makaan Tak Dekhoon
items.content:
Mujh ko hasrat hai use dil ke makaan tak dekhoon
Band aankhon se pare wehm o gumaan tak dekhoon

Teri chahat ne yun nazron ke hain manzar badle
Teri soorat hi nazar aaye jahan tak dekhoon

Iski nazrein toh naye roz nazaare dekhein
“Main faqat ek hi tasweer kahan tak dekhoon”

Mere aage hi woh gulshan ko jalaaye mere
Aur majboor kare hai ke dhuaan tak dekhoon

Mujh ko bakhshi hai mohabbat ne karaamat aisi
Koi dekhe na jahan tak main wahan tak dekhoon

Waqt dikhlaata hai sab ko hi tamasha Saani
Warna yeh kis ki tamanna hai khizaan tak dekhoon

items.title: Kitna Karte Ho Pyar Aaj Kaho
items.content:
Kitna karte ho pyar aaj kaho
Kab se tha intezaar aaj kaho

Ghair ke kehne se baghaawat ki
Kaun hai ghamgusaar aaj kaho

Mulk ko lag gayi nazar kis ki
Kyun hai yeh intebaar aaj kaho

Qarz pehla na jab chuka paaye
Kaise loge udhaar aaj kaho

Peeth peeche bahut phadakte the
Robro hoon main yaar aaj kaho

Aqal waalon ne dil ganwa daala
Kaun hai hoshiyaar aaj kaho

Bhaai bhaai ke darmiyaan Saani
Pad gayi kyun daraar aaj kaho

items.title: Jo Chhoda Tha Isi Par Aagya Na
items.content:
Jo chhoda tha isi par aagya na
Tere haathon mein khanjar aagya na

Main kehta tha kabutar mat udaana
Bechaara zakhm khaa kar aagya na

Bahut aasaan samajhte the wafa ko
Tumhein bhi yaar chakkar aagya na

Nateeja yeh tumhaari soch ka hai
Hukoomat mein sitamgar aagya na

Hamaare qatl pe kal tum hi chup the
Tumhaara bhi toh number aagya na

Adab ki saari deewaarein gira kar
Sar-e-mehfil woh joker aagya na

Qasam khaa kar gaya tha gaon se tu
Magar Saani palat kar aagya na

items.title: Zameen Ke Saath Ambar Bolta Hai
items.content:
Zameen ke saath ambar bolta hai
Khuda ek hai yeh manzar bolta hai

Wahi haq hai jo haq par bolta hai
Mujaahid ka kata sar bolta hai

Woh jab Allah Akbar bolta hai
Adu ke chehre pe dar bolta hai

Agar haq pe ho insaan toh qasam se
Madad mein iski patthar bolta hai

Khata kar ke kahan main jee sakoon ga
Mere dil ka qalandar bolta hai

Kisi zaalim ke aage sar jhuka do
Yeh kab koi sukhnavar bolta hai

Badon se jis ko milti hain duaayein
Usi ka toh muqaddar bolta hai

Dilawar tum ise samjho yahan jo
Sitamgar ko sitamgar bolta hai

Lahu se tar faza hai aaj saari
Yeh sehma sehma manzar bolta hai

Sila tujh ko mila hai parwarish ka
Yeh beta jo palat kar bolta hai

Hai khatra haq bayaani mein aye logo
Magar Saani barabar bolta hai

items.title: Is Ke Siwa Kisi Se Mohabbat Nahi Hui
items.content:
Is ke siwa kisi se mohabbat nahi hui
Lekin yeh baat kehne ki himmat nahi hui

Hum muntazir hain aaj bhi un ke liye magar
Un ko palat ke aane ki fursat nahi hui

Utra rahe the kal miyaan aql o shaoor par
Tum se bhi apne dil ki hifaazat nahi hui

Har su hua dhuaan dhuaan laashon ka dheer hai
Aisi kabhi toh shehr ki haalat nahi hui

Khush ho ke apni zindagi ghurabat mein kaat li
Taabey kisi ke meri zaroorat nahi hui

Shaitaan kyun na aise gharon mein karein ge raaj
Muddat se jin gharon mein tilaawat nahi hui

Saani hamaare ghar ka muhaafiz bana hai woh
Apne hi ghar ki jis se hifaazat nahi hui

items.title: Aql Hairaan Hai Meri Aaj Woh Kya Kehte Hain
items.content:
Aql hairaan hai meri aaj woh kya kehte hain
Aankh waale bhi, andhere ko zia kehte hain

Aap bhi jaanch lein, duniya ki haqeeqat kya hai
Hum ne jaancha hai tabhi is ko bura kehte hain

Un se ulfat hai humein bas yeh sabab hai warna
Hum kisi ke kahan nakhre ko ada kehte hain

Kya badi baat jo tum par bhi uthi hai ungli
“Hoti aayi hai ke achhon ko bura kehte hain”

Mutabar woh toh kabhi ho nahi sakte Saani
Apne honthon se kisi ko jo bura kehte hain

items.title: Jo Hua So Hua Amma Chhodo
items.content:
Jo hua so hua amma chhodo
Zulm ka tazkira amma chhodo

Haadiso, woh bhi tum mera rasta
Rok paoge kya amma chhodo

Dard kaisa mujhe diya us ne
Kya sunoge bhala amma chhodo

Mujh ko maloom hai ke kya ho tum
Lambi yun pheekna amma chhodo

Matlabi daur mein kisi se bhi
Pyar ka silsila amma chhodo

Dil se khelo na jab kaha us se
Us ne hans ke kaha amma chhodo

Jis ka akhlaaq hi na behtar ho
Woh bashar hai bhala amma chhodo

Aap Saani raho hamesha khush
Aap qissa mera amma chhodo

items.title: Ranj O Gham Aur Musibat Ke Siwa
items.content:
Ranj o gham aur musiibat ke siwa
Zindagi kya hai aziyat ke siwa

Itne bhi zulm o sitam theek nahi
Ke bache kuchh na baghaawat ke siwa

Tum na chhedo kabhi ghairat ko meri
Paas kuchh bhi nahi ghairat ke siwa

Hum ghareebon ke gharon mein sahib
Aur kya rakha hai barkat ke siwa

Milne jab bhi kare dil aa jaayein
Kuchh bacha hi nahi fursat ke siwa

Is ko apnon ki mohabbat na mili
Jis ko kuchh bhaaye na shohrat ke siwa

Ek din munh ki khaayega woh
Kuchh nahi karta jo gheebat ke siwa

Hum deewane hain deewanon ko kaam
Kuchh nahi aata hai ulfat ke siwa

Daur-e-haazir ke bashar mein Saani
Aaj sab kuchh toh hai ghairat ke siwa

items.title: Paagal Koi Majnoon Koi Deewana Kahe Hai
items.content:
Paagal koi Majnoon koi deewana kahe hai
Ek tere siwa koi bhi achha na kahe hai

Parbat ko ukhaade hai samundar ko sameete
“Karke bhi dikhaaye hai jo deewana kahe hai”

Aye dil tu ise bhool ja behtar yahi hoga
Aatish mein yeh jalte hue parwaana kahe hai

Maine toh kabhi is ko paraaya nahi jaana
Haan woh toh magar mujh ko hi begaana kahe hai

Tum la do kahin se toh mere yaar ko la do
Kambakht yahi baat mera shaana kahe hai

Saani ki ghazal aur na mehfil mein suni jaaye
Jab jab bhi suno apna hi afsaana kahe hai

items.title: Hausla Misal-e-Paighambar Rakhna
items.content:
Hausla misal-e-Paighambar rakhna
Apne andar kayi lashkar rakhna

Mutabar hone ki chahat hai gar
Fikr tum auron se behtar rakhna

Ab toh mumkin hi nahi lagta hai
Apna kirdaar munawwar rakhna

Ek din mehnga padega tujh ko
Haq ghareebon ka daba kar rakhna

Tera kirdaar hai teri pehchaan
Yaad yeh baat barabar rakhna

Tera imaan gauhar hai Saani
Is gauhar ko tu bacha kar rakhna

items.title: Karke Upkaar Zara Dekh Le Dukhiaari Par
items.content:
Karke upkaar zara dekh le dukhiaari par
Dil ko taskeen mila karti hai ghamkhwaari par

Sochta hoon ke main basti se chala jaaun kahin
Log hanste hain yahan dosto laachari par

Laut kar duniya ko funkaar samajhne waale
Khud hi kal roye ga tu dekhna hoshiyari par

Waqt ne aaj kahan la ke use chhoda hai
Naaz jis ko tha kabhi dosto funkaari par

Meri haalat pe zara soch samajh ke hansna
Rashk karti hai yeh ghurabat meri khuddari par

Kya milega tujhe aye Saani wafa pe chal kar
“Ab toh inaam diya jaata hai ghadari par”

items.title: Kya Kahoon Us Ne Kya Diya Phir Se
items.content:
Kya kahoon us ne kya diya phir se
Mujh ko nishtar laga diya phir se

Muddaton baad hosh aaya tha
Us ne jalwa dikha diya phir se

Band aankhon se maine canvas par
Us ka chehra bana diya phir se

Jo ujaala hi apna kho baitha
Kaise keh doon bhala diya phir se

Zikr ghairon se un ka sunte hi
Dil ne mahshar utha diya phir se

Zakhm mera kareed kar Saani
Dard us ne badha diya phir se

items.title: Dam Akhad Akhad Jaaye Zindagi Bikhar Jaaye
items.content:
Dam akhad akhad jaaye zindagi bikhar jaaye
Toot kar jo seene mein dil kabhi bikhar jaaye

Hai bahut andhere mein aaj kal meri duniya
Tum jo laut aao toh roshni bikhar jaaye

Chain se yeh paagal bhi thodi der so lega
Zulf kaali kaali gar aap ki bikhar jaaye

Maut itni mohlat de kaam yeh main kar jaaun
Gham sameet loon saare aur khushi bikhar jaaye

Waasta hai ulfat ka aap muskura dein toh
Is udaas chehre pe taazgi bikhar jaaye

Aap ko khabar bhi hai roothne se kya hoga
Sach kahoon toh Saani ki shaa'iri bikhar jaaye

items.title: Ulfat Mein Dil Fareefta Banaye Hue To Hain
items.content:
Ulfat mein dil fareefta banaye hue toh hain
Yaani ke khud ka hosh udaaye hue toh hain

Garcha mile na khwaab ki taabeer umr bhar
Palkon pe apne khwaab sajaaye hue toh hain

Maana ke is ko aane ki fursat nahi magar
Hum aas iski phir bhi lagaaye hue toh hain

Kuchh aur ho toh woh bhi la kar ke de do tum
Ranj o alam ka bojh uthaaye hue toh hain

Baaqi koi bhi ab humein chahat nahi rahi
Saansein mein is ki khushbu basaaye hue toh hain

Woh hai maseeha mera dawa de ke chhod de
Zakhmon ko is ko Saani dikhaaye hue toh hain

items.title: Paas Aa Aye Mere Yaar Thoda Sa Aur
items.content:
Paas aa aye mere yaar thoda sa aur
Kar mujhe khud se bezaar thoda sa aur

Main tumhaari gali se chala jaaunga
Mujh ko karne do deedaar thoda sa aur

Zindagi toh phiregi kahan dar badar
Paas aa doon tujhe pyar thoda sa aur

Kaam himmat se le aye mere dil zara
Raasta hai yeh parkhaar thoda sa aur

Tu har ek saf se baahar nikal jaayega
Gar gira tera kirdaar thoda sa aur

Jald hi laut aaunga pardes se
Sabr kar mere dildaar thoda sa aur

Tujh ko bhi mil hi jaayega koi khitaab
Tu badha Saani miyaar thoda sa aur

items.title: Kitna Bhooka Hai Yeh Zamaana Bhi
items.content:
Kitna bhooka hai yeh zamaana bhi
Khaaye chidiyon ka aab o daana bhi

Jis ki ulfat pe naaz karte ho
Mashwara hai ke aazmaana bhi

Main tere intezaar mein roya
Jab ke mausam toh tha suhaana bhi

Dekh ke un ko hans diya warna
Mera mushkil tha muskurana bhi

Jab mukhaalif hua ho aye Saani
Hai karaamat diya jalaana bhi

items.title: Hijr Mein Tumhaara Dil Kaise Yaar Lagta Hai
items.content:
Hijr mein tumhaara dil kaise yaar lagta hai
Saansein ka guzarna bhi mujh pe baar lagta hai

Kal talak bichhadne ka dar jise sataata tha
Wasl aaj kal is ko naagwaar lagta hai

Chot khaaya hota hai jo bhi shakhs chahat mein
Phoolon ka bichhauna bhi is ko khaar lagta hai

Tum ko kya khabar hai ke milti hai khushi kitni
Jab kisi musafir ka nao paar lagta hai

Jab talak woh rehta hai saath mein mere yaaro
Yeh khizaan ka mausam bhi khushguwaar lagta hai

Ladkhadaye phirta hoon aaj kal jo main Saani
Is ki hi mohabbat ka yeh khumaar lagta hai

items.title: Kahoon Kya Ek Teri Dosti Ko
items.content:
Kahoon kya ek teri dosti ko
Mohabbat thi nahi mujh se kisi ko

Rafaaqat ho gayi jab tirgi se
Diya thukra raha hai roshni ko

Lahu unki bhi aankhein ro rahin aaj
Jo aasaan keh rahe the aashiqi ko

Jise chaho use paagal bana do
Maysar yeh ada hai aap hi ko

Mere khwaabon mein aayi thi kabhi jo
Yeh aankhein dhoondti hain bas usi ko

items.title: Is Ko Paana Meri Hasrat Hi Sahi
items.content:
Is ko paana meri hasrat hi sahi
Gar yeh ghaflat hai toh ghaflat hi sahi

Main toh masti mein rahoon ga har dam
Zindagi mein ho aziyat hi sahi

Saath tera hai gawaara mujh ko
Dosti teri musiibat hi sahi

Ek shehzaadi se chahat kar li
Yeh hamaaqat hai hamaaqat hi sahi

Meri ghurabat hai inaayat teri
Tu agar khush hai toh ghurabat hi sahi

Kar de Saani ko tu hans kar rukhsat
Chaahe rakh dil mein kadurat hi sahi

items.title: Yeh Karishma Hua Aap Hi Ke Sabab
items.content:
Yeh karishma hua aap hi ke sabab
Har khushi mil gayi dosti ke sabab

Aql jaati rahi hosh jaata raha
Kya se kya ho gaye aashiqi ke sabab

Bhook bachchon ki maan se na dekhi gayi
Aabroo bech di muflisi ke sabab

Is naye daur mein yeh taraqqi hui
Aadmi mar raha aadmi ke sabab

Log duniya mein aise bhi maujood hain
Sarkhuro ho gaye aajizi ke sabab

Meri aankhon ne dekhe aise bhi ghar
Jin ka rutba badha laadli ke sabab

Saani manzil milegi bhala kis tarah
Jo hain bhatke hue rahbari ke sabab

items.title: Mar Jaana Haq Ki Khaatir Dil Se Qubool Hai
items.content:
Mar jaana haq ki khaatir dil se qubool hai
Mere qabeelay ka yeh puraana usool hai

Un ke jamaal-e-husn ko socho toh ghaur se
Ulfat na ho gayi toh ghulaami qubool hai

Tum se sawaal hai mera tum hi jawaab do
Woh kaise muskuraaye jo gham se malool hai

Is baar bhi na aayega maloom hai aye dil
Yun intezaar karna tumhaara fazool hai

Is dil ka kya majaal ke is ko bhula de yeh
Is dil ke goshe goshe mein yaadon ki dhool hai

items.title: Pur Sukoon Gaon Nagar The Pur Sukoon Baazaar Tha
items.content:
Pur sukoon gaon nagar the pur sukoon baazaar tha
Jab talak Allah waala mulk ka sardaar tha

Zindagani ke safar mein gham ka ek kohsaar tha
Jab talak hum ko tumhaare pyar se inkaar tha

Thokron mein the hamaare duniya ke sab takht o taaj
Zikr-e-Rab se dil hamaara jab talak sarshaar tha

Aye ameer-e-shehr tujh ko dena hoga ab hisaab
Phir kyun woh maara gaya jo aadmi khuddaar tha

Jung kaise jeeti hum ne duniya ko hairaani hai
Haath mein khanjar na koi saath mein saalaar tha

Har ghadi bharta hoon dam mein is liye aslaaf ka
Saaf suthre log the woh mutabar kirdaar tha

Kaise karta Saani is ke pyar se inkaar main
Dil nasheen is ki ada thi aankhon mein israr tha

items.title: Un Ka Hi Aitbaar Karte Rahe
items.content:
Un ka hi aitbaar karte rahe
Jo humein be-qaraar karte rahe

Apni duniya kharaab hoti rahi
“Zikr-e-fasl-e-bahaar karte rahe”

Ek muddat se woh nahi aaye
Hum magar intezaar karte rahe

Isi khaana kharaab ki khaatir
Roz darya ko paar karte rahe

Is ki galiyon mein aane jaane ki
Bhool hum baar baar karte rahe

Mehnati log ban gaye sooraj
Hum sitaare shumaar karte rahe

items.title: Mujhe Farq Kuchh Nahi Padta Hai, Chaahe Mujh Se Koi Khafa Rahe
items.content:
Mujhe farq kuchh nahi padta hai, chaahe mujh se koi khafa rahe
Mere saath koi rahe na rahe, mere saath mera Khuda rahe

Mere dard ka na malaal kar, mere paas aa meri baat sun
Mere saamne zara baith toh, taake gham se dil yeh raha rahe

Mera aakhri toh salaam le mera aakhri toh kalaam sun
Yeh dua hai tere habeeb ki tera gham se rishta kata rahe

Yeh jahaan saara tamasha ghar yeh tamasha dekhna hai magar
Tujhe jaana hai aye bashar kahan, tujhe yaad yeh bhi sada rahe

Main deewana ishq ka hoon miyaan, mujhe dar nahi kisi rog ka
Hai yeh ishq gar koi rog toh, mujhe rog phir yeh laga rahe

items.title: Teri Nafrat Ko Bhi Maine Kab Nafrat Se Dekha Hai
items.content:
“Teri nafrat ko bhi maine kab nafrat se dekha hai”
Jab bhi dekha tujh ko dilbar bas chahat se dekha hai

Hum donon ki ek kahaani, ek si apni haalat hai
Ek dooje ko jab jab dekha, bas hairat se dekha hai

Yeh toh mera Rab jaane hai ya phir jaane dil mera
Armaanon ko jalte maine kis shiddat se dekha hai

Mere shaane pe us ka sar ghanton ghanton rehta tha
In aankhon ne aisa manzar bhi qismat se dekha hai

Ab toh woh katraane laga hai Saani mukh dikhlaane se
Jis ne mujh ko ek zamaane tak fursat se dekha hai

items.title: Tum Se Wada Hai Is Deewane Ka
items.content:
Tum se wada hai is deewane ka
Sar jhuka dega yeh zamaane ka

Koi rasta zaroori niklega
Hausla keejiye toh aane ka

Maana ke dost dost hota hai
Zakhm lekin nahi dikhaane ka

Haal-e-dil be-wafa ghamandi ko
Faida kuchh nahi sunaane ka

Tum ko ab kaun rok paayega
Tum ne tai kar liya hai jaane ka

Darya-e-ishq mein na utre woh
Jis ko khadsha ho doob jaane ka

Ishq keejiye magar yeh yaad rahe
Fidya lagta hai muskuraane ka

Tere kooche mein dosti kar li
Yeh bahaana hai aane jaane ka

Aaj woh bhi toh hai nishaane par
Shauq jis ko tha aazmaane ka

Tere bimaar ki guzaarish hai
Tark kar de irada jaane ka

items.title: Guzra Hai Kaisa Saaniha Dil Khoob Jaane Hai
items.content:
Guzra hai kaisa saaniha dil khoob jaane hai
Kya hai sitam ka maajra dil khoob jaane hai

Hone na dein ge aap ki tauheen jeete ji
Kis ki khata hai aap ka dil khoob jaane hai

Bas aap lutf leejiye bharpoor wasl ka
Dushwaar kitna rasta tha dil khoob jaane hai

Manzil pe aa ke kyun na main shukr-e-Khuda karoon
Tha kaun roda raste ka dil khoob jaane hai

Mehfooz mere paas hai tohfa har ek ka
Kis ne hai mujh ko kya diya dil khoob jaane hai

Saani kabhi bhi aap shikaayat na keejiye
Kya hai wafa ka zaabta dil khoob jaane hai

items.title: Sehmi Hui Hai Aaj Faza Ghat Raha Hai Dam
items.content:
Sehmi hui hai aaj faza ghat raha hai dam
Zehreeli ho gayi hai hawa ghat raha hai dam

Saare jahaan mein barpa qayaamat si ho gayi
Aayi hai kaisi yaar waba ghat raha hai dam

Jo bhi hai baat aa ke suna toh woh robro
Khaamoshiyon pe teri mera ghat raha hai dam

Duniya ke kehne pe kabhi hota na tha malaal
Tum ne kaha hai jab se bura ghat raha hai dam

Mere habeeb tujh ko mohabbat ka waasta
Mere bhi haq mein kar de dua ghat raha hai dam

items.title: Jafa Toh Kar Ya Wafa Ab Toh Teri Marzi Hai
items.content:
Jafa toh kar ya wafa ab toh teri marzi hai
Bura samajh ya bhala ab toh teri marzi hai

Hawa ke saamne hum ne toh rakh diya Maula
Diya jala ya bujha ab toh teri marzi hai

Izhaar-e-ishq mera tujh se karna jurm sahi
Rahaayi de ya saza ab toh teri marzi hai

Main tere waaste apnon ko chhod aaya hoon
Gale laga na laga ab toh teri marzi hai

Tumhaare saamne sar kham tumhaara mujrim hai
Muaafi de ya saza ab toh teri marzi hai

items.title: Raah Par Dushmanon Ki Woh Chalne Lage
items.content:
Raah par dushmanon ki woh chalne lage
Dost mere sabhi ab badalne lage

Rehnumaon ne mujh ko hai gumraah kiya
Paon manzil ki jaanib jo chalne lage

Ab muhaafiz chaman ka miyaan kaun hai
Khud hi maali gulon ko masalne lage

Mere honthon pe kalma-e-tawheed ho
Ya Khuda jab mera dam nikalne lage

Umar bhar mein jinhein dost kehta raha
Meri shohrat se Saani woh jalne lage

items.title: Teri Aankhon Mein Jo Kaajal Nahi Hai
items.content:
Teri aankhon mein jo kaajal nahi hai
Falak pe door tak baadal nahi hai

Wafa ka ek haami main yahan hoon
Mere jaisa koi paagal nahi hai

Agar patthar nahi toh phir woh kya hai
Daya ka jis mein ganga jal nahi hai

Yahan toh qatl hota hai barabar
Magar dekho yahan maqtal nahi hai

Kisi ke hijr ne khaamosh kiya hai
Meri duniya mein ab halchal nahi hai

Tujhe kaise bataaun ke tere bin
Mujhe aaraam pal do pal nahi hai

Wafa ka mas’ala aisa hai Saani
Sahi poochho toh koi hal nahi hai

items.title: Ab Rahaayi Ya Zamaanat Ho Na Ho
items.content:
Ab rahaayi ya zamaanat ho na ho
Ishq toh hai hum ko raahat ho na ho

Jo abhi hai aisi soorat ho na ho
Kal mujhe bhi teri chahat ho na ho

Ek teri bas inaayat kaafi hai
Ab kisi ki bhi inaayat ho na ho

Aap ki mujh ko zaroorat hai bahut
Aap ko meri zaroorat ho na ho

Aa gaya hoon ishq ke baazaar mein
Faide ki yeh tijaarat ho na ho

Aankh bhar kar dekh lene do use
Kya pata phir se ziyaarat ho na ho

Aao baithein mil ke Saani aaj hum
Kal mayassar waqt-e-fursat ho na ho

items.title: Iski Yaadon Ke Main Lashkar Se Ghira Rehta Hoon
items.content:
Iski yaadon ke main lashkar se ghira rehta hoon
Par kata ek parinda sa pada rehta hoon

Muddaton baad bhi aayi na unhein yaad meri
Jin ki khaatir main yahan but sa bana rehta hoon

Itni aasaani se pehchaan nahi mit sakti
Main jahan rehta hoon insaan bana rehta hoon

Kyun zamaane ki kahi baaton mein aa jaate ho
Main kisi se bhi nahi yaar khafa rehta hoon

Jis ke dil mein na ho ehsaas-e-mohabbat Saani
Aise logon se bahut door sada rehta hoon

items.title: Ek Nazar Dekh Lo Aa Kar Tum Ho
items.content:
Ek nazar dekh lo aa kar tum ho
Meri saanson mein barabar tum ho

Jee mein aaya ke abhi mar jaayein
Is ne jab bola ke loafer tum ho

Tum ko ehsaas nahi tum kya ho
Meri himmat mera tewar tum ho

Koi maane ke na maane sach hai
Chalta phirta hua khanjar tum ho

Chaand nikla hai yeh sab kehte hain
Mujh ko maloom hai chhat par tum ho

items.title: Koi Shikwa Nahi Zamaane Se
items.content:
Koi shikwa nahi zamaane se
Dil toh toota hai dil lagaane se

Jab mera dam nikal hi jaayega
Faida hoga phir kya aane se

Tu kahin khud na ruswa ho jaaye
Baaz aa bhi ja aazmaane se

Kaise tere baghair zinda hoon
Dekhne aa kisi bahaane se

Door kaisa yeh aagya Saani
Log darte hain muskurane se

items.title: Kaam aisa mahaan kar baitha
items.content:
Kaam aisa mahaan kar baitha
Apni aankhein woh daan kar baitha

Itni oonchi udaan kar baitha
Khud hi aafat mein jaan kar baitha

Bhao galle ka ab badhaaya yaaro
Khudkushi jab kisaan kar baitha

Zakhm deta raha wahi mujh ko
Jis ko apna main jaan kar baitha

Daur-e-haazir mein haq ka paikar bhi
Khud ko ab be-zabaan kar baitha

Is deewane pe kuchh nahi sahib
Ek dil tha woh daan kar baitha

Woh iyaadat ko aayein ge Saani
Main yeh kaisa gumaan kar baitha

items.title: Kisi se dil ko lagaane ki kya zaroorat thi
items.content:
Kisi se dil ko lagaane ki kya zaroorat thi
Be-wajah ashk bahaane ki kya zaroorat thi

Tumhein thi hum se mohabbat to saaf keh dete
Ghooma phira ke bataane ki kya zaroorat thi

Diyar-e-ishq mein jab shauq na tha marne ka
Diyar-e-ishq mein aane ki kya zaroorat thi

Khata hamaari thi hum ko hi bas saza dete
Hamaari basti jalaane ki kya zaroorat thi

Agar iraada tha Saani ko chhod jaane ka
To itne paas bhi aane ki kya zaroorat thi

items.title: Aap se kya juda hua hai dil
items.content:
Aap se kya juda hua hai dil
Saari duniya se hi khafa hai dil

Jis kisi ne bhi un ko dekha hai
Un pe apna luta gaya hai dil

Ishq mein kya bura hai kya achha
Ishq mein kab yeh sochta hai dil

Bhool ja un ko aur khush reh tu
Tujh se mera yeh mashwara hai dil

Un se milna giraan guzarta hai
Un se mera bahut dukha hai dil

Un ko ehsas-e-gham nahi tera
Jin ki khaatir tu jal raha hai dil

Kaise tode ga ab koi Saani
Main ne patthar sa kar liya hai dil

items.title: Yaar hansne hansaane ka maahol ho
items.content:
Yaar hansne hansaane ka maahol ho
Kuchh to gham ko bhulaane ka maahol ho

Dil tadapte the auron ka gham dekh kar
Aaj phir us zamaane ka maahol ho

Hum to jannat samajhte hain aksar ise
Khush numa jis gharane ka maahol ho

Ek pal bhi theharta nahi main wahan
Jis jagah dil dukhane ka maahol ho

Ishq, chahat, mohabbat, wafa, dosti
In ko dil se nibhaane ka maahol ho

Saani ro ro ke karta hai dil se dua
Khush numa is zamaane ka maahol ho

items.title: Aap jab todoge apni khamoshi ka silsila
items.content:
Aap jab todoge apni khamoshi ka silsila
Muskura utthega phir se dosti ka silsila

Poochh lo chaahe kisi se sab ko hai maloom yeh
Tum se wabasta hai meri har khushi ka silsila

Faida tera hua na faida mera hua
Aao mil kar khatam kar dein dushmani ka silsila

Ek nazar jo dekha us ko phir na poochho kya hua
Jad gaya hai zindagi se aashiqi ka silsila

Dil phata jaata hai ab to Saani ka shaam o sahar
Ab khudara tod dijiye rukhi ka silsila

items.title: Main hoon meetha sa ek samandar dekh
items.content:
Main hoon meetha sa ek samandar dekh
Mere andar utar ke dilbar dekh

Us ki aankhon ne yeh kaha mujh se
Hai ijaazat tujhe mukarrar dekh

Hijr mein tere is deewane ka
Haal kitna bura hai aakar dekh

Maang lena falak se taare bhi
Pehle apni to yaar chadar dekh

Gham liye kis tarah se zinda hoon
Ek din mere saath jee kar dekh

items.title: Wafa o pyar ki baatein
items.content:
Wafa o pyar ki baatein
Hain ab bekaar ki baatein

Zamaana ab nahi sunta
Miyaan khuddar ki baatein

Taraqqi chahiye phir to
Suno darbaar ki baatein

Akele roz sunta hoon
Dar o deewaar ki baatein

Puraani ho gayi hain ab
Lab o rukhsar ki baatein

Kisi bewa se mat karna
Kabhi singhaar ki baatein

Saleeqe se sunati hain
Pari kohsar ki baatein

Jo achha hai woh kyun samjhe
Kisi beemaar ki baatein

Darati hai bahut Saani
Mujhe hoshiyar ki baatein

items.title: Le to saari ki saari duniya rakh
items.content:
Le to saari ki saari duniya rakh
Meri aankhon mein mera sapna rakh

Khud ko ab tu mahaw tamasha rakh
Apne lab par laga ke taala rakh

Tu yahan par sabhi se rishta rakh
Apne dil ko bana ke darya rakh

Jis ke man mein jo aaya likh daala
Kis ne bola tha dil ko saada rakh

Hai taqaaza yahi judai ka
Apni yaadon mein us ko zinda rakh

Koi sunta nahi kisi ki ab
Paas apne to apna dukhda rakh

Teri duniya ujad bhi sakti hai
Apne qaboo mein apna gussa rakh

Khud zamaana gale lagaaye ga
Dil se to door baghz o keena rakh

Kaamyabi qadam ko chume gi
Hausla barqaraar apna rakh

Surat-e-haal kuchh bhi ho Saani
Apne lab par sada to kalma rakh

items.title: Tanha tanha chalna hoga kab tak aakhir hum ko aur
items.content:
Tanha tanha chalna hoga kab tak aakhir hum ko aur
Ishq ki aag mein jalna hoga kab tak aakhir hum ko aur

Tumhein nikaalo rasta koi baat milan tak aapahunche
Door se haath ko milna hoga kab tak aakhir hum ko aur

Har dam har pal har lamha sochta rehta hai saail
Ghair ke dar se palna hoga kab tak aakhir hum ko aur

Ab to karam kar apna bana le de de pyar ki bheek humein
Tere dar se talna hoga kab tak aakhir hum ko aur

Bhool gaye woh hum ko ya phir door basa li basti hai
Is sadme mein ghalna hoga kab tak aakhir hum ko aur

items.title: Kahin pe phool kahin dil bichha diya main ne
items.content:
Kahin pe phool kahin dil bichha diya main ne
Woh aa rahe hain yun rasta saja diya main ne

Bas ab to dekhna yeh hai ke faisla kya ho
Jo mere dil mein tha woh sab suna diya main ne

Meri yeh saadaagi dekho jo mera qatil hai
Use to apne hi ghar ka pata diya main ne

Woh meri raah mein kaante bichha raha hai ab
Woh jis ko dosto chalna sikha diya main ne

Yeh baat aur hai mujh ko woh yaad aata hai
Yeh baat sach hai ke dil se bhula diya main ne

items.title: Zindagaani thi meri bas wahi zindagi
items.content:
Zindagaani thi meri bas wahi zindagi
Maan ke saaye tale jo kati zindagi

Aye andhere mujhe to daraye ga kya
Haadison mein meri to pali zindagi

Yeh mohabbat ajab shay hai yaaro yahan
Jis ko bhi mil gayi hai mili zindagi

Zindagi bhar ana bech sakta nahi
Muflisi chheen chaahe meri zindagi

Hum ne seekha tha dil behal jaaye ga
Saani ab ban gayi shayari zindagi

items.title: Saamne bas mere aaina reh gaya
items.content:
Saamne bas mere aaina reh gaya
Kho gayein manzilein rasta reh gaya

Is zamaane mein ab apna kis ko kahoon
Matlabi bas yahan waasta reh gaya

Kis taraf jaaun main aaj hairaan hoon
Har taraf haadsa haadsa reh gaya

Mere jeene ki maangi hai kyun kar dua
Ab sitam aap ka kaun sa reh gaya

Chhod kar chal diye dost Saani sabhi
Saath mere mera hausla reh gaya

items.title: Mujh ko woh kya mile zindagi mil gayi
items.content:
Mujh ko woh kya mile zindagi mil gayi
Mere honton ko yaaro hansi mil gayi

Ab se pehle bhatakta raha dar badar
Saath jab tum chale rehberi mil gayi

Yeh meri zindagaani andheron mein thi
Tera saath jab mila roshni mil gayi

Main ghamon ke jahaan se nikal aaya hoon
Tune ki jab wafa har khushi mil gayi

Yeh meri saansein thamne lagi thi magar
Tum ko dekha to phir zindagi mil gayi

items.title: Kar liya tum ne iraada yeh kabhi socha bhi hai
items.content:
Kar liya tum ne iraada yeh kabhi socha bhi hai
Is mohabbat ke safar mein door tak sehra bhi hai

Badtameezi kar rahe ho tum abhi jis shakhs se
Jaan le lega tumhaari us ka ek beta bhi hai

Kya kahoon main aaj kya hai ishq ka rutba yahan
Yeh jahaan hai ishq se par ishq pe pehra bhi hai

Hum karein fariyaad kyun jab hone wala kuchh nahi
Jo hamaara hukmaraan hai goonga hai behra bhi hai

Tum bulandi pe pahunch ke yun na itraaya karo
Arsh se girte ko main ne farsh par dekha bhi hai

Is sakhi se mil ke mera dil bahut hi khush hua
Shukr hai Maula ka koi to hai jo achha bhi hai

items.title: Woh jis ne dekha ho bas roshni ko
items.content:
Woh jis ne dekha ho bas roshni ko
Woh kya jaane kisi ki teergi ko

Koi ilzaam kyun doon main kisi ko
Udaasi bha gayi hai zindagi ko

Rafaaqat ho gayi jab teergi se
Diya thukra raha hai roshni ko

Lahu un ki bhi aankhein ro rahi hain
Jo aasaan keh rahe the aashiqi ko

Jise chaho use paagal bana do
Mayassar yeh ada hai aap hi ko

Mere khwabon mein aayi thi kabhi jo
Yeh aankhein dhoondti hain bas usi ko

Hamaare waaste jugnoo bahut hain
Tum apne paas rakho chaandni ko

items.title: Sada-e-haq daba de ga abe ja
items.content:
Sada-e-haq daba de ga abe ja
Mujhe sooli chadha de ga abe ja

Mujhe an RC ka dar dikha kar
Meri neendein uda de ga abe ja

Watan yeh jaan se bhi pyara hai hum ko
Yahan se to bhaga de ga abe ja

Hamaare dil mein hai Bharat ka naqsha
Ise kaise mita de ga abe ja

Hain bhai bhai hum Hindu Musalmaan
To aapas mein lada de ga abe ja

Tera sapna yeh sapna hi rahe ga
Humein aur to mita de ga abe ja

Hamaari shaan hai awwal hi rehna
Humein Saani bana de ga abe ja

items.title: Jaagna aur jagate rehna
items.content:
Jaagna aur jagate rehna
Raah bhoole ko dikhate rehna

Un ka darwaaza khule ga ek din
Haaziri roz lagate rehna

Kaam aasaan nahi hai lekin
Rasm-e-ulft ko nibhate rehna

Aap ko mehnga bhi pad sakta hai
Dil kisi ka yun dukhate rehna

Adl o insaaf ki khaatir Saani
Aap talwaar uthate rehna

items.title: Koo bakoo yun jo bhatakta hoon main har dam har pal
items.content:
Koo bakoo yun jo bhatakta hoon main har dam har pal
Us ki khaatir hi tadapta hoon main har dam har pal

Hijr ke teer ne aisa kiya zakhmi dil ko
Apne andar hi siskta hoon main har dam har pal

Kal meri yaad mein aansoo bhi bahaaye ga woh
Aaj kal jis ko khatakta hoon main har pal har dam

Apne pairon pe khada ho ke rahoon ga ek din
In dino gir ke sambhalta hoon main har dam har pal

Jaanta hoon main use paa nahi sakta Saani
Phir bhi paane ko machalta hoon main har dam har pal

items.title: Tu hai qareeb mere aur justaju karein kya
items.content:
Tu hai qareeb mere aur justaju karein kya
Tere siwa kisi se bhi guftagu karein kya

Tune humein to ruswa mehfil mein kar diya hai
Teri shikayatein hum bhi roobaru karein kya

Footpath par koi kal ro ro ke keh raha tha
Logo badal gaya hai apna lahu karein kya

Chaara garon ki mere fitrat ajeeb si hai
Nashtar lagaayein aur phir poochhein raffoo karein kya

Ghar se nikalna Saani dushwaar ho gaya hai
Baitha qadam qadam pe apna adu karein kya

items.title: Kaise bayaan karoon main ke kya kya nazar mein hai
items.content:
Kaise bayaan karoon main ke kya kya nazar mein hai
Us ka haseen jalwa mere chashm-e-tar mein hai

Aasaar mere dost qayamat ke to nahi
Akhlaq ke alawa to sab kuchh bashar mein hai

Barson raha hoon chaand mein us ki nazar ka yaar
Do chaar din se woh jo tumhaari nazar mein hai

Us ka khayaal dil se nikaala na jaaye ga
Woh fikr o fun mein aur meri rahguzar mein hai

Asraat us ke rone ke garchay nahi to phir
Saani nami si kis liye deewaar o dar mein hai

items.title: Zindagaani ki dagar achhi nahi
items.content:
Zindagaani ki dagar achhi nahi
Ab yahan shaam o sahar achhi nahi

Toot jaaye dil kisi ka aye miyaan
Badgumani is qadar achhi nahi

Lut gayi ismat kisi masoom ki
Yeh khabar hai par khabar achhi nahi

Bin tumhaare sach kahoon kaisi rahi
Chaandni shab thi magar achhi nahi

Rooth kar jab se gaye hain woh udhar
Ab hawa chalti udhar achhi nahi

Keh rahi thi ek pari maan baap se
Kyun jahaan ki ab nazar achhi nahi

Tod dena dosti Saani magar
Ek zara si baat par achhi nahi

items.title: Adu ki bheed dekho na adu ka qaafila dekho
items.content:
Adu ki bheed dekho na adu ka qaafila dekho
Tumhaare hauslon pe munhasar hai maarka dekho

Kisi ke saath bhi tum se na insaafi nahi hogi
Umar Farooq jaisa tum jo kar ke faisla dekho

Yeh tum se keh diya kis ne ke tum kuchh kar nahi sakte
Laga do jaan ki baazi phir apna martaba dekho

Nazar aane lage gi dushmanon mein khoobiyaan tum ko
Tum apni soch ka pehle badal kar zaawiya dekho

Bacha laaya hoon kashti ko main toofaan se bhi aye Saani
Meri himmat, meri jurrat, mera tum hausla dekho

items.title: Jo daanishmand hote hain kabhi aisa nahi karte
items.content:
Jo daanishmand hote hain kabhi aisa nahi karte
Khayaal-e-dil sabhi ke saamne rakha nahi karte

Mile jazbe wiraasat mein musaibat se bhi ladne ke
Kabhi hum mushkilon se yaar ghabraaya nahi karte

Mere bigde hue haalaat pe kehne lage ahbaab
Kisi ko is qadar bhi toot kar chaha nahi karte

Hamaari shaan o shokat ka sabab hai yeh zamaane mein
Siwa Allah ke auron se hum maanga nahi karte

Hamaare ghar mein faaqa ho ke chaahe tangdasti ho
Khuda ka shukr hai eemaan ko hum becha nahi karte

Saleeqa hi nahi aata humein jeene ka aye Saani
Agar maan baap bachpan mein humein daanta nahi karte

items.title: Yaad un ki dila ke aakhir kaar
items.content:
Yaad un ki dila ke aakhir kaar
Kya mila dil dukha ke aakhir kaar

Hum to barbaad ho gaye sahib
Shehr ulfat mein aa ke aakhir kaar

Tum ko jaana hi tha chale jaate
Kyun gaye dil jala ke aakhir kaar

Kar diya sharminda dushman ko
Mujh ko apna bana ke aakhir kaar

Khud ko badnaam kar hi daala na
Raaz apna suna ke aakhir kaar

Kab talak dil ko Saani behlaaye
Us ki photo dikha ke aakhir kaar

items.title: Woh jo kahe wahi karein aise nahi hain hum
items.content:
Woh jo kahe wahi karein aise nahi hain hum
Deewanagi mein itne bhi behke nahi hain hum

Jee bhar ke aaj jashn mana le tu fath ka
Maidaan mein tere saamne utre nahi hain hum

Tareekh hai gawaah hamaare usool ki
Basti kabhi bhi koi jalaaye nahi hain hum

Mahfooz hum ko dekh ke hairat zada hai tu
Haalaat ke sitam se jo toote nahi hain hum

Us ne to khoob chaha ke mit jaayein hum magar
Rab ka hai yeh karishma ke mitte nahi hain hum

Maala hamaare naam ka japta tha jo kabhi
Us ki nazar mein in dino achhe nahi hain hum

Reh jaaye bas bhram yahi tere gumaan ka
Saani hai sach to yeh ke farishte nahi hain hum

items.title: Buzurgon ke jo qadmon mein kabhi baitha nahi hoga
items.content:
Buzurgon ke jo qadmon mein kabhi baitha nahi hoga
Kisi bhi tor se woh shakhs to aala nahi hoga

Tujhe ruswa main kar doonga teri chaukhat pe khud mar ke
Maseeha gar dawaa mere zakhmon ka nahi hoga

Kisi bhooke sawaali ko jo woh phatkaar deta hai
Mujhe lagta hai shaayad us ka dil zinda nahi hoga

Tilaawat jo koi karta rahe ga Surah-e-Baqarah ki
Yeh dawaa hai ke us ke haath mein kaasa nahi hoga

Jahan ajdaad rehte the jagah woh dhoond sakta hoon
Agar chaupaal ka boorha shajar kaata nahi hoga

Tumhein ehsas kab hoga shajar ko kaatne waale
Shajar katte rahe yun hi to phir saaya nahi hoga

Siyasi jo hai un se tum aye Saani faasla rakhna
Saga mera nahi hai yeh saga tera nahi hoga

items.title: Dil se jab apne buzurgon ki dua paaoge
items.content:
Dil se jab apne buzurgon ki dua paaoge
Apni duniya se har ek gham ko juda paaoge

Dawaa karte ho yeh jo mujh se mohabbat ka tum
Kya meri raahon ke kaanton ko hata paaoge

Ha humein rabt tumhaara raha mazboot agar
Ek chhodo kaee lashkar ko hara paaoge

Meri chahat, meri ulfat, meri qurbaani tum
Bhoolna chaho ge phir bhi na bhula paaoge

Azm himmat hai, na dil mein koi jazba Saani
Kaise sehra mein koi phool khila paaoge

items.title: Salamat jab talak eemaan hai aisa nahi hoga
items.content:
Salamat jab talak eemaan hai aisa nahi hoga
Kisi Firaun ke aage mera sajda nahi hoga

Meri ghairat ki tum qeemat lagaane aa gaye phir se
Tumhein so baar bola hai ke yeh sauda nahi hoga

Na chhedo hum shareefon ko isi mein khair hai warna
Nateeja jaan lo us ka kabhi achha nahi hoga

Chalan ab chhod bhi do tum mujhe be ja sataane ka
Nahi to haal woh kar doon ga jo socha nahi hoga

Ibaadat jaan ke maan baap ki khidmat karo warna
Tumhaare haq mein bhi kal ke liye achha nahi hoga

Lahu rote hue us baap ko dekha hai kal main ne
Jo kehta tha kabhi loafer mera beta nahi hoga

Haqeeqat mein wahi haqdaar hai jannat ka aye Saani
Khuda ka raasta jis shakhs ne chhoda nahi hoga

items.title: Qalb se qalb ka jab raabta ho jaaye ga
items.content:
Qalb se qalb ka jab raabta ho jaaye ga
Ek dooje ke liye aaina ho jaaye ga

Azm himmat se agar leta raha kaam to phir
Tera aasaan khud hi raasta ho jaaye ga

Kaun kya hai yahan duniya ko pata chal jaaye
Aao maidaan mein kabhi faisla ho jaaye ga

Talkh lehje se hamesha hi bacha kar warna
Tere apnon se tera faasla ho jaaye ga

Neend aankhon se bahut door chali jaaye gi
Hijr se jis roz miyaan waasta ho jaaye ga

Hijr ke dard se dam toot raha Saani ka
Kis ko maloom tha yeh haadsa ho jaaye ga

items.title: Zindagaani ke safar mein haadsa kuchh kam na tha
items.content:
Zindagaani ke safar mein haadsa kuchh kam na tha
Lekin apna hausla bhi ba Khuda kuchh kam na tha

Phool sab murjha gaye shaakhon se kaliyaan gir padi
Mera gulshan se nikalna haadsa kuchh kam na tha

Shukr hai Allah ka jo main raha saabit qadam
Warna to zulm o sitam ka silsila kuchh kam na tha

Maana ke qismat mein apni tha likha ranj o alam
Haan magar kirdaar is mein aap ka kuchh kam na tha

Mil rahi hai zindagi us roz se hans kar gale
Ek nazar tera mujhe woh dekhna kuchh kam na tha

Kaash Saani aaina dil ki nazar se dekhta
Fikr mein tere pareshaan aaina kuchh kam na tha

items.title: Tumhaara saath jab ho ga to phir aisa nahi ho ga
items.content:
Tumhaara saath jab ho ga to phir aisa nahi ho ga
Yun be tarteeb sa hargiz mera kamra nahi ho ga

Tumhaare baad kya ho ga tumhein kaise main samjhaoon
Meri aankhein to hon gi haan magar sapna nahi ho ga

Tere aashiq nahi hon ge tujhe yeh kab kaha main ne
Magar dawaa hai deewana mere jaisa nahi ho ga

Juda hona nahi mujh se mere dilbar kabhi warna
Mera is dil ke dhadkan se koi rishta nahi ho ga

Nayi yaari hai tujh se is liye tareef karta hai
Abhi bechara tujh ko theek se samjha nahi ho ga

items.title: Jeene ke liye hargiz aisa nahi karte hain
items.content:
Jeene ke liye hargiz aisa nahi karte hain
Luqma kabhi auron ka chheena nahi karte hain

Uththe jo qadam phir to manzil pe hi ja pahunche
Thak haar ke raahon se lota nahi karte hain

Wade pe atal un ko dekha hai sada hum ne
Islam ke shehdaayi dhoka nahi karte hain

Woh khud bhi taraste hain aye yaar hansi khaatir
Muskaan jo ghairon mein baanta nahi karte hain

Rone ke siwa un ko kuchh kaam nahi rehta
Haalaat ke rukh ko jo parkha nahi karte hain

Be kaar hi karte hain moti ki tamanna woh
Darya ki satah tak jo utra nahi karte hain

Tareekh wahi apni karte hain raqam Saani
Had se bhi zyaada jo socha nahi karte hain

items.title: Yaaro mujh ko aksar aisa kyun lagta hai soch raha hoon
items.content:
Yaaro mujh ko aksar aisa kyun lagta hai soch raha hoon
Aakhir woh hi dil ko pyara kyun lagta hai soch raha hoon

Is duniya mein aur bhi yaaro rehte mere saath hain lekin
Sab se zyaada woh hi apna kyun lagta hai soch raha hoon

Un ki aankhein meri aankhein kal parson takraayi lekin
Sadiyon puraana un se rishta kyun lagta hai soch raha hoon

Kya main paagal ho baitha hoon ya ab paagal ho jaaun ga
Khud ka saaya us ka saaya kyun lagta hai soch raha hoon

Mujh pe kya hai jaado ya phir main hi ishq mein paagal hoon
Us ke siwa har ek begaana kyun lagta hai soch raha hoon

Dilkash dilkash manzar mein bhi woh gar mere saath nahi to
Jeena mushkil ho ga mera kyun lagta hai soch raha hoon

Un ka wada bilkul sacha aur ka wada bilkul jhootha
Mujh ko Saani jaane aisa kyun lagta hai soch raha hoon

items.title: Kya hai tune dikhaawa dikhaawa nikle ga
items.content:
Kya hai tune dikhaawa dikhaawa nikle ga
Khuloos ke bina bekaar sajda nikle ga

Kuchh aur der thehar saath tu abhi mere
Yeh dekhna isi sehra se darya nikle ga

Ameer-e-shehr laraz jaaye ga falak us din
Agar yateem ki aankhon se qatra nikle ga

Wafa ki aad mein nashtar chubho diya us ne
Khabar kahaan thi mera yaar aisa nikle ga

Zara to sabr se himmat se kaam le aye dost
Yahin se dekhna manzil ka rasta nikle ga

Khud apne aap pe Saani yaqeen hai mujh ko
Meri hatheli se ek din ujaala nikle ga

items.title: Tamaam umar jo karta raha hai kaam ghalat
items.content:
Tamaam umar jo karta raha hai kaam ghalat
Bane ga kaise na us ka to phir maqaam ghalat

Zaroori hai karein achhon ka ehtiraam magar
Khayaal rakhiye ghalat ka hai ehtiraam ghalat

Tumhaare dar pe agar haaziri na ho to phir
Hamaari subah ghalat hai hamaari shaam ghalat

Ghazal kahoon ke rubaayi kahoon ke nazm kahoon
Agar na ho tera charcha to sab kalaam ghalat

Saza de ya ke muaafi de teri marzi hai
Agar kare kabhi tera ghulam kaam ghalat

Namaaz roza ho ya ho koi amal Saani
Agar dikhawe ke hon to hain saare kaam ghalat

items.title: Ishq kar ke tune aye dil khaak achha kar liya
items.content:
Ishq kar ke tune aye dil khaak achha kar liya
Gham kya mudd-e-muqabil khaak achha kar liya

Jis mein shaamil bhooka koi aur na pyasa hua
Yeh sajaayi tune mehfil khaak achha kar liya

Kya padha likha watan mein neeta koi tha nahi
Chun ke to laaya hai jaahil khaak achha kar liya

Jis ne mandir aur masjid ki na rakhi laaj tak
Tum ne ho ke bheed mein shaamil khaak achha kar liya

Dekh le aye be-wafa main jee raha hoon aaj bhi
Kar ke mere dil ko basmil khaak achha kar liya

Masnad-e-peer-e-mughaan ke waaste tum ne miyaan
Na ahal ko samjha qaabil khaak achha kar liya

Dhoop se dar kar ke Saani zulf-e-saayedaar mein
Bhool baitha apni manzil khaak achha kar liya

items.title: Na poochho hum se tum kya kya hum apna chhod dete hain
items.content:
Na poochho hum se tum kya kya hum apna chhod dete hain
Kisi ki gar tamanna ho to duniya chhod dete hain

Hunar jis mein yahan hota hai aksar rehnumaayi ka
Usi ko qaafile waale akela chhod dete hain

Hamaare daur ke haakim kya karte hain aisa bhi
Ujaala chheen lete hain andhera chhod dete hain

Yaqinan surkh ro hote hain duniya mein wahi ek din
Ke jo bhai ki khaatir apna hissa chhod dete hain

Sambhal kar aap rahiye ga yahan chaalaak logon se
Chura lete hain dil ko aur kaleja chhod dete hain

Haqeeqat mein bharosa un pe yeh duniya nahi karti
Jo apnon pe yahan karna bharosa chhod dete hain

Bahut jaldi use duniya bhula deti hai aye Saani
Wahi jo apne purkhon ka tareeqa chhod dete hain

items.title: Haye kaisi apni qismat ho gayi
items.content:
Haye kaisi apni qismat ho gayi
Be-wafa se kyun mohabbat ho gayi

Aabroo bhi bik rahi hai in dino
Kitni mehngi ab zaroorat ho gayi

Ishq thehra jab hamaqat aaj kal
Aap se phir kyun hamaqat ho gayi

Is liye aankhein barasti hain meri
Un ko dekhe ek muddat ho gayi

Ab na umeed-e-wafa karna yahan
Ab yeh duniya be-murawwat ho gayi

Chhin gayin yak lakht saari ronqein
Laadli jab ghar se rukhsat ho gayi

Ab woh aaye hain palat kar kis liye
Jab ke gham khaane ki aadat ho gayi

items.title: Us ki tarah hamaari to aadat na hone ki
items.content:
Us ki tarah hamaari to aadat na hone ki
Basti jala ke dil ko masarrat na hone ki

Mujh ko nikaale shehr se ya jaan le le woh
Maghroor hukmaraan se aqeedat na hone ki

Faaqa kashi ke dar se main eemaan bech doon
Mujh se kabhi bhi aisi tijarat na hone ki

Ajdaad ne sikhaaya murawwat ka jo sabaq
Us ko bhula doon aisi hamaqat na hone ki

Ilaan kar ke shehr mein sab ko bataaya jaaye
Kam zarf jo hai us ki ita’at na hone ki

Farma diya Khuda ne to Quran mein ja baja
Luqma haraam kha ke ibaadat na hone ki

Mujrim agarchay baap ho beta ho bhai ho
Mujh se kabhi uski himayat na hone ki

items.title: Aman ke qatil aman ke dushman ab to teri khair nahi
items.content:
Aman ke qatil aman ke dushman ab to teri khair nahi
Tune jalaaya Hind ka gulshan ab to teri khair nahi

Mandir masjid ke chakkar mein kitna khoon bahaaye ho
Jaan chuki sachayi jin jin ab to teri khair nahi

Apni soorat jis mein aksar mil ke dekha karte the
Tod diya woh tune darpan ab to teri khair nahi

Taaqat kya hai hum jaison ki ab ke pata chal jaaye ga
Tune ki janta se an ban ab to teri khair nahi

Achhe din ke khwab dikha kar phir se loot na paaye ga
Sun le mere desh ke rehzan ab to teri khair nahi

items.title: Aaj tak un ki mohabbat se yun bezaar hain hum
items.content:
Aaj tak un ki mohabbat se yun bezaar hain hum
Umar bhar woh yeh samajhte rahe aghyaar hain hum

Husn-e-kirdaar kabhi hum ne na chhoda logo
Yeh alag baat hai ke khair se zardar hain hum

Tees zakhmon se jo uthti hai maza aata hai
Is liye teri jafaon ke talabgaar hain hum

Teri marzi hai hansa de ya rula de hum ko
Ab tere ishq o mohabbat mein giraftaar hain hum

Ghair ke dar pe padi rehti hai pagdi un ki
Aur yeh kehte hain ke sahib-e-dastaar hain hum

Hum se hoti nahi duniya ki ghulaami Saani
Apni duniya ke miyaan aaj bhi mukhtaar hain hum

items.title: Tere gulnaar chehre ki zia kuchh aur kehti hai
items.content:
Tere gulnaar chehre ki zia kuchh aur kehti hai
Magar mujh mein jo baithi hai ana kuchh aur kehti hai

Tumhein bolo bharosa kar lein hum tum pe bhala kaise
Zabaan kuchh aur kehti hai ada kuchh aur kehti hai

Koi to baat hai jis ko chhupaana chahte ho tum
Bata to kuchh rahe ho par faza kuchh aur kehti hai

Woh mere bin bahut khush hai yeh qaasid ne kaha lekin
Use jo chhoo ke aayi hai saba kuchh aur kehti hai

Hui hai jail Zaani ko chalo yeh maante hain hum
Shareeat to magar us ki saza kuchh aur kehti hai

Kabhi tha aman ka paikar aye Saani mulk Hindustan
Magar is waqt ki aab o hawa kuchh aur kehti hai

items.title: Yeh meri aankh jo parnam nahi hai
items.content:
Yeh meri aankh jo parnam nahi hai
Ise lagta hai mujh ko gham nahi hai

Meri himmat mera to hausla dekh
Kisi gham ka koi maatam nahi hai

Khafa hai yun ameer-e-shehr mujh se
Yeh sar kyun us ke aage kham nahi hai

Banaaya hai use mahboob jab se
Mere hisse mein koi gham nahi hai

Abhi se ruk gaye nashtar lagaana
Abhi to aankh bhi parnam nahi hai

Sambhal kar zakhm to apne dikhaana
Kisi ke haath mein marham nahi hai

Woh manzil ko na paaye ga kabhi bhi
Iraada jis ka mustahkam nahi hai

Kabhi to paas aakar dekh lena
Tere bin Saani mein dam kham nahi hai

items.title: Khuloos o wafa aur chahat agar ho
items.content:
Khuloos o wafa aur chahat agar ho
Badal jaayein haalaat himmat agar ho

Hon lashkar ke lashkar adu chaahe phir bhi
Humein jeet jaayein ge millat agar ho

Kaee tajor hon ge qadmon mein tere
Ana se takabbur se nafrat agar ho

Dua rad ho teri yeh mumkin nahi hai
Ibaadat bhi teri ibaadat agar ho

Rahein ge darinde charinde bhi mil kar
Umar jaisi logo khilaafat agar ho

Use boye jannat mile gi na hargiz
Ke jis ke bhi dil mein kadoorat agar ho

Kabhi aadmiyat se bhatke na koi
Amal mein Muhammad ki seerat agar ho

Palat aaye chaalis gharon se bhi seeri
Sahaaba ke jaisi mohabbat agar ho

Pighal jaaye patthar yeh mumkin hai Saani
Jo eemaan mein tere haraarat agar ho

items.title: Na poochh mujh ko kya mila mazaq hi mazaq mein
items.content:
Na poochh mujh ko kya mila mazaq hi mazaq mein
Ghamon se aashna hua mazaq hi mazaq mein

Haseen sunehre khwab saare choor choor ho gaye
Kisi ne jab jaga diya mazaq hi mazaq mein

Bahut udaas lag rahe ho in dino to tum miyaan
Kisi ne gham diya hai kya mazaq hi mazaq mein

Na aankhon ko qaraar hai na dil ko hi sukoon hai
Yeh kaisa rog lag gaya mazaq hi mazaq mein

Samajh mein baat aa gayi ke dil lagi hai kya bala
Koi bana koi mita mazaq hi mazaq mein

Kisi ke dil ko todna bahut bada gunaah hai
Woh yeh gunaah kar raha mazaq hi mazaq mein

Safar-e-hayaat ka bahut hai Saani qeemati kahin
Guzar na jaaye dekhna mazaq hi mazaq mein

items.title: Jo idhar haal hai woh udhar bhi to ho
items.content:
Jo idhar haal hai woh udhar bhi to ho
Meri chahat ki us ko khabar bhi to ho

Sirf baatein banaane se kya faida
Tujh mein dil jeetne ka hunar bhi to ho

Kaise tanha koi muskuraye bhala
Dilruba, hum nawa, hum safar bhi to ho

Jis ki khaatir lutaun main jaan o jigar
Koi aisa yahan mutabar bhi to ho

Dam nikal jaaye na tere beemaar ka
Ek nazar aye Maseeha idhar bhi to ho

Gar hai khwahish ke bulbul ka naghma sunoon
Tere angan mein Saani shajar bhi to ho

items.title: Mere jazbaat zinda hain abhi armaan baaki hai
items.content:
Mere jazbaat zinda hain abhi armaan baaki hai
Tere kooche se kyun jaaun main jab tak jaan baaki hai

Khabar kis ko hai kab logo yahan manzar badal jaaye
Abhi maujon ke dil mein hashr ka toofaan baaki hai

Nafas mere zara thehro, zara sa sabr to rakho
Ke unke aane ka dil mein abhi imkaan baaki hai

Woh harjaayi hai phir bhi kyun use to yaad karta hai
Abhi kya aur koi gham dil-e-nadaan baaki hai

Nahi hai saath to mere haqeeqat hai yahi lekin
Teri yaadon ka dil ki mez par guldaan baaki hai

Jo sachaayi ki khaatir jaan bhi de deta hai apni
Abhi duniya mein aisa bhi koi insaan baaki hai

Zamaane ke dilaase ki mujhe haajat nahi Saani
Khuda ka shukr hai lab par abhi muskaan baaki hai

items.title: Rahe gi hamesha hi rifat watan ki
items.content:
Rahe gi hamesha hi rifat watan ki
Agar tum rakho ge mohabbat watan ki

Woh zinda hamesha dilon mein rahe ga
Ke paayi hai jis ne shahaadat watan ki

Sikhaata hai insaan ko har ek mazhab
Ibaadat hai karna hifaazat watan ki

Bhala kar taassub chalo sochte hain
Mitaaye kis tarah se adaawat watan ki

Kahin doob jaaye woh paani mein ja kar
Na ho jis ke dil mein mohabbat watan ki

Lagaana gale saaf dil se adu ko
Rahi hai puraani riwaayat watan ki

Sunaao ghazal bhaayi chaare ki Saani
Yahi hai abhi to zaroorat watan ki

items.title: Na bhoolo ge shaheedon ki shahaadat ko qasam khao
items.content:
Na bhoolo ge shaheedon ki shahaadat ko qasam khao
Hamesha yaad rakhoge fazeelat ko qasam khao

Panapne tum na doge yaar nafrat ko qasam khao
Mitaaoge zamaane se adaawat ko qasam khao

Kabhi sone ki chidiya thi yeh apna mulk Hindustan
Wahi chidiya banaani hai yeh Bharat ko qasam khao

Mitaana hai mitaana hai mitaana hai mitaana hai
Yeh pyaare desh Hindustan se nafrat ko qasam khao

Hamaara bhi tumhaara bhi tiranga shaan hai sab ki
Tirange ki na jhukne den ge rifat ko qasam khao

Watan ke waaste phaansi bhi chadh jaaoge tum Saani
Na doge aanch aane iski azmat ko qasam khao

items.title: Kaise aslaaf ka raasta chhod dein
items.content:
Kaise aslaaf ka raasta chhod dein
Log kehte hain ke hum wafa chhod dein

Phir zaroorat padi roshni ki yahan
Phir charaagh-e-mohabbat jala chhod dein

Woh girein ge bulandi se meri tarah
Un se keh do ana ka nasha chhod dein

Sach to sach hai kabhi jhoot hota nahi
Hum bhale dekhna aaina chhod dein

Phir se duniya deewani mohabbat ki ho
Dil ka darwaaza gar hum khula chhod dein

Yeh naye daur ka hai naya qaafila
Aap Saani zara raasta chhod dein

items.title: Yeh maanoge ek din kaha dekh lena
items.content:
Yeh maanoge ek din kaha dekh lena
Wafa mein mile ga dagha dekh lena

Abhi jis ko to ne bithaaya hai sar pe
Wahi kaat le ga gala dekh lena

Himaayat karoge jo tum zaalimon ki
Tumhaara bhi hoga bura dekh lena

Karoge abhi se jo zid is ki poori
Bigad jaaye ga laadla dekh lena

Falak se main taare le aaunga ek din
Rahi aap ki gar dua dekh lena

items.title: Ab siwa maut ke koi chaara nahi
items.content:
Ab siwa maut ke koi chaara nahi
Un ke bin ek pal bhi guzaara nahi

Rooth kar woh mujhe be-sada kar gaye
Phir yeh kehte hain mujh ko pukaara nahi

Teri saazish thi yeh jo jala aashiyaan
Warna koi bhi dushman hamaara nahi

Tere bache na den ge sahaara tujhe
Tu bhi maan baap ka gar sahaara nahi

Aisi kashti ka Saani musafir hoon main
Door tak jis ka koi kinaara nahi

items.title: Zindagaani ka bhi mausam suhaana hua
items.content:
Zindagaani ka bhi mausam suhaana hua
Dosto! Ghar mere is ka aana hua

Badle badal se hain dost mere sabhi
Jab se ghurabat ka ghar mein thikaana hua

Eid ka chaand tera bahut shukriya
Is ki deedar ka ek bahaana hua

Umar bhar khush rakha hum ne maan ko magar
Doodh ka qarz hum se ada na hua

Aaj Saani mujhe phir woh yaad aa gaya
Jis ko bhule hue ek zamaana hua

items.title: Kisi ke ghar ke liye aur kisi ki jaan ke liye
items.content:
Kisi ke ghar ke liye aur kisi ki jaan ke liye
Khuda se maang rahe hain dua jahaan ke liye

Tujhe agar hai zaroorat to le ke ja sooraj
Mujhe to kaafi hai jugnu mere makaan ke liye

Akele mein meri tabiyat yeh mujh se kehti hai
Koi ghazal to kaho meri jaan-e-jaan ke liye

Abubakr, Ali, Usman, Umar ke jaise phir
Ameer chaahiye duniya ko kaarvaan ke liye

Zabaan di hai Khuda ne Khuda ki bole gi
Zabaan meri nahi ghair ke bayaan ke liye

items.title: Dosto shikwe gile ko bhool jaayein Eid mein
items.content:
(Ghazal Eid)

Dosto shikwe gile ko bhool jaayein Eid mein
Aao mil kar jashn hum aisa manaayein Eid mein

Kaun hai apna paraya bhool jaana hai hamein
Dushmanon ko bhi gale apne lagayein Eid mein

Zindagi hai chaar din jab dushmani phir kis liye
Kyun na dushmanon ko bhi apne ghar bulaayein Eid mein

Hum agar chaahein ke khushiyaan hum ko dobaala mile
To kisi muflis ke bacche ko hansaayein Eid mein

Bhaayi chaare se yeh apna mulk ho aaraasta
Aao hum sab Rab se maangein yeh duaaein Eid mein

Rab ki yeh marzi hai Saani hum jo hain pardes mein
Kaun chaahe dil se ke hum ghar na aayein Eid mein

items.title: Tamaasha dekhne waalo tumhein is ki khabar kya hai
items.content:
Tamaasha dekhne waalo tumhein is ki khabar kya hai
Jala jis ka makaan is ke hua dil pe asar kya hai

Teri yaadon ka uthta hai dhuaan dil se mere hamdam
Kabhi tu bhi to aa kar dekh mera haal-e-jigar kya hai

Agar woh dekh le hans kar to sab deewane ho jaayein
Miyaan is ki nigaahon mein Khuda jaane asar kya hai

Iraada neek ho jis ka to manzil mil hi jaaye gi
Musafir ke bhala aage yeh darya ka safar kya hai

Sataaye jo ghareebon ko rulaaye jo yateemon ko
Agar zaalim nahi to phir bataayein woh bashar kya hai

Duaao ko mere Maula rasaayi kyun nahi milti
Ke is naacheez Saani ki ibaadat mein kasar kya hai

items.title: Yaar hum se kya hamaare kho gaye
items.content:
Yaar hum se kya hamaare kho gaye
Khoobsurat sab nazaare kho gaye

Aatish-e-nafrat ki zad mein dosto
Maaon ke pyaare dilaare kho gaye

Kis tarah se woh guzaare zindagi
Jis dukhi maan ke sahaare kho gaye

Jee rahe hain aap ke bin aise hum
Jaise kashti se kinaare kho gaye

Waqt ne Saani dikhaaya yeh asar
Aaj hum se hi hamaare kho gaye

items.title: Aaina tu hamein mat dikhaana kabhi
items.content:
Aaina tu hamein mat dikhaana kabhi
Sach ko seekha nahi hai chhupaana kabhi

Ghar tera bhi jala sakti hai aag to
Ghar kisi ghair ka mat jalaana kabhi

Be-basi saailon ki jo chehre pe hai
Bhoole se bhi hansi mat udaana kabhi

Ab palat kar bhi woh dekhta bhi nahi
Mera shaana tha jis ka thikaana kabhi

Tum ko hogi yaqeenan khushi ba-Khuda
Apne maan baap ka sar dabaana kabhi

Aaj nafrat hai jin ko mere naam se
Gaate the woh mera hi taraana kabhi

Zakhm yaadon ke Saani ubhar aate hain
Padhta hoon jab koi khat puraana kabhi

items.title: Woh jab se mere paas aane lage hain
items.content:
Woh jab se mere paas aane lage hain
Jahaan waale toofaan uthaane lage hain

Mili hai jo kursi hukoomat ki un ko
Ishaaron pe sab ko nachaane lage hain

Khuda jaane anjaam kya ho gulon ka
Chaman baaghbaan khud jalaane lage hain

Jo sapne dikhaate the achhe dinon ke
Wahi meri neendein udaane lage hain

Bhala ghar se kaise na jaaye gi barkat
Sawaali ko dar se bhagaane lage hain

Main mashhoor Saani hua ja raha hoon
Ghazal meri sab gungunaane lage hain

items.title: Jise nazar mein jigar mein basa ke rakhte hain
items.content:
Jise nazar mein jigar mein basa ke rakhte hain
Usi se apni mohabbat chhupa ke rakhte hain

Har ek raaz jo dil mein chhupa ke rakhte hain
Tamaam rishton ko apne bacha ke rakhte hain

Basaat kya hai andheron ki jo idhar thehrein
Charaagh ho ke na ho dil jala ke rakhte hain

Hamein bhula de zamaana yeh ghair mumkin hai
Hunar zamaane mein apni ada ke rakhte hain

Unhein kisi ka kahaan gham dikhaayi deta hai
Ananiyat ka jo chashma laga ke rakhte hain

Gale lagaati hain un ko hi manzilein Saani
Jo log hausla apna bana ke rakhte hain

items.title: Yeh mere paas aye logo zara sa kya hua paisa
items.content:
Yeh mere paas aye logo zara sa kya hua paisa
Main kab khulta tha duniya ko mera khulne laga paisa

Hamaari dosti mein faasla aata nahi lekin
Hamaare aur un ke darmiyaan bas aa gaya paisa

Akele woh samajhta hai yahan apne ko turam khan
Kahin se mil gaya jis ko miyaan thoda ghana paisa

Karodhon ke jo maalik hain yahan woh bhi nahi jeete
Kisi ko kab bachaata hai kisi insaan ka paisa

Bakheelon ke to honthon par naza ke waqt aye Saani
Yahi kalmaat hote hain mera paisa mera paisa

items.title: Ban ke mausam bahaar aaye ho
items.content:
Ban ke mausam bahaar aaye ho
Saath apne khushi bhi laaye ho

Jaan le lo ge kya sanam bolo
Kis liye baithe sar jhukaaye ho

Chhod do mera imtehaan lena
Maat kitni dafaa to khaaye ho

Kal ka anjaam soch lena tum
Aaj mujh ko jo yun rulaaye ho

Ba-khabar tum nahi zamaane se
Is liye be-nakaab aaye ho

Aaj mil hi gaya sukoon dil ko
Tum jo hans kar gale lagaaye ho

Dhoondte ho wafa yahan Saani
Doosre kya jahaan se aaye ho

items.title: Ishq karne waalon mein faasla nahi hota
items.content:
Ishq karne waalon mein faasla nahi hota
Tan juda to hota hai man juda nahi hota

Hum agar samajh jaate waqt ki nazaakat ko
Rehzanon ke haathon mein qaafila nahi hota

Doosron pe jo aksar ungliyaan uthaata hai
Aadmi to woh khud bhi paarsa nahi hota

Toot kar agar logo aadmi bikhar jaaye
Phir to umar bhar paida hausla nahi hota

Maan ki jab dua le kar ghar se main nikalta hoon
Raaste mein phir koi haadsa nahi hota

Dosti zara Saani aap soch kar keeje
Kaun kab badal jaaye kuchh pata nahi hota

items.title: Tareekiyon ko yun bhi mitaana pada mujhe
items.content:
Tareekiyon ko yun bhi mitaana pada mujhe
Raah-e-wafa mein dil ko jalaana pada mujhe

Yun hi nahi chaman mein aayi bahaar hai
Pehle lahu se gul ko khilaana pada mujhe

Runaaiyon ne shehr ki roka bahut magar
Waade pe tere laut aana pada mujhe

Woh kya gaya ke saari khushi saath le gaya
Aakhir ghamon ko apna banaana pada mujhe

Qeemat na poochhiye ke mohabbat ki kya rahi
Khud ko mita ke mol chukaana pada mujhe

Dekha kya raqeeb ki baahon mein jab use
Naam-e-wafa ko dil se mitaana pada mujhe

Saani charaagh tab kahin ja kar ke yeh jala
Pehle to ghar hi apna jalaana pada mujhe

items.title: Mujh ko chahat mein kya hua teri
items.content:
Mujh ko chahat mein kya hua teri
Ab jafa bhi lage wafa teri

Bujh gaya hoon to kya khata teri
Yeh to fitrat hai aye hawa teri

Zikr jab bhi hua jafaon ka
Yaad aati rahi wafa teri

Ab kisi aur ko lubhaana to
Hum ne to dekh li ada teri

Neem jaan ho gaye teri khaatir
Aur chahat hai kya bata teri

Log dil ko dukha ke hanste hain
Yahi duniya hai kya Khuda teri

Qatl to ne kiya bharose ka
Kis qalam se likhoon saza teri

Tujh mein Saani ananiyat kyun hai
Jaavedaan jaan hai kya bata teri

items.title: Khud ko itna bhi mat uchhaala kar
items.content:
Khud ko itna bhi mat uchhaala kar
Qad mila hai to qad sambhaala kar

Tujh ko manzil ki hai agar chahat
Raasta khud naya nikaala kar

Saaf tauba se bhi na ho paaye
Dil ko itna bhi tu na kaala kar

Kuchh nahi nafraton se haasil hai
Pyaar hi pyaar dil mein paala kar

Jaan jaaye to jaane de Saani
Haq ka har dam hi bol baala kar

items.title: Sochiye ga zara yeh Khuda ke liye
items.content:
Sochiye ga zara yeh Khuda ke liye
Zindagi kya mili hai khata ke liye

Ab mujhe gham mile ya khushi dosto
Zindagi waqf ki hai wafa ke liye

Mujh ko paagal zamaana samajhta raha
Main phira kobko dilruba ke liye

Har museebat meri door hoti gayi
Haath jaise uthaaye dua ke liye

Woh to mar ke bhi duniya mein zinda raha
Jaan di jis ne Saani Khuda ke liye

items.title: Jahaan tere liye hai na tu jahaan ke liye
items.content:
Jahaan tere liye hai na tu jahaan ke liye
Khuda ne bheja hai insaan ko imtehaan ke liye

Mujhe bhi shauq se sooli pe tum chadha dena
Zabaan khule gi magar meri haq bayaan ke liye

Main un ko daastaan apni sunaane baith gaya
Magar woh aaye the khud apni daastaan ke liye

Khudara aur mera imtehaan mat lena
Taras raha hoon main barson se teri haan ke liye

Yahan to jaise bhi katni thi kat gayi Saani
Rakha hai aap ne saamaan bhi kuchh wahan ke liye

items.title: Hujre ke paas hai na woh mimbar ke aas paas
items.content:
Hujre ke paas hai na woh mimbar ke aas paas
Waaiz ko hum ne dekha hai saaghar ke aas paas

Aankhon mein ashk aa gaye jab hum ne yeh suna
Baithe hue hain log sitamgar ke aas paas

Is ko dara raha hai tu rehta hai jis ka dil
Waliyon buzurgon aur qalandar ke aas paas

Paani ki ek boond mayassar na ho saki
Jeene ko jee rahe hain samundar ke aas paas

Hikmat hai kya Khuda ki kisi ko nahi khabar
Paala hai but shikan ko bhi Aazar ke aas paas

Chain o sukoon dil ko mila hai bahut Khuda
Aaya hai jab se Saani tere dar ke aas paas

items.title: Khuda ke saamne ek din sabhi ka faisla hoga
items.content:
Khuda ke saamne ek din sabhi ka faisla hoga
Wahan badla mile ga sab ko jis ne jo kiya hoga

Jala kar ghar ghareebon ka jo tum utarte phirte ho
Kabhi socha Khuda ke saamne anjaam kya hoga

Safar ki mushkilon se tum kabhi waapas nahi hona
Chalo ge aur aage to koi rasta naya hoga

Wafa ka main hoon shehdaayi wafa ko aam kar dunga
Kisi mehboob se koi nahi hargiz juda hoga

Adu ki main shikaayat kya karoon tum hi kaho Saani
Laga hai peeth par khanjar koi apna raha hoga

items.title: Rukh apna pheir ke mujh se jo ja raha hai ab
items.content:
Rukh apna pheir ke mujh se jo ja raha hai ab
Nazar mein laake nazar se gira raha hai ab

Hamaare daur mein poochho na ishq ki haalat
Hamaare daur mein fitna bata raha hai ab

Khuda hi jaane ke kya hai iraada qaatil ka
Mera maseeha woh khud ko bata raha hai ab

Fareb deta tha auron ko jo zamaane mein
Fareb kha ke zamaane se ja raha hai ab

Khilaaf mere raqeebon ne kardiya us ko
Woh mere dil ko musalsal dukha raha hai ab

Bayaaz Mir ko Saani ne kiya padha logo
Zameen-e-Mir mein ghazlein suna raha hai ab

items.title: Tujh se main dar jaaun kaahay ko
items.content:
Tujh se main dar jaaun kaahay ko
Jeete jee mar jaaun kaahay ko

Mera Rab to hai dil mein mere
Dhoondne baahar jaaun kaahay ko

Mere haq mein jab woh chaand nahi
Chhat ke oopar jaaun kaahay ko

Mera muhaafiz jab hai saath mere
Le ke lashkar jaaun kaahay ko

Main hoon bhikaari ek tere dar ka
Phir main dar dar jaaun kaahay ko

Jin ko rishte ka ehsaas nahi
Un ke main ghar jaaun kaahay ko

items.title: Daur-e-haazir mein aisi khata kis liye
items.content:
Daur-e-haazir mein aisi khata kis liye
Maangte ho wafa ka sila kis liye

Jo na karna tha woh hi kiya kis liye
Beech kar kha gaye tum ana kis liye

Jaam bhar bhar ke kal tak pilaate rahe
Ab mujhe keh rahe ho bura kis liye

Dekh kar roshni hum ghareebon ke ghar
Dil miyaan aap ka jal giya kis liye

Jab zamaane se ladne ki himmat nahi
Tum hue ishq se aashna kis liye

Main to kehta tha bachna ameeron se tum
Aaj dil tootne ka gila kis liye

Un dinon kya the tum yaad Saani ko hai
In dinon bante ho paarsa kis liye

items.title: Kya ajab shay yeh pyaar hai sahib
items.content:
Kya ajab shay yeh pyaar hai sahib
Naam ki bas bahaar hai sahib

Ab to duniya usi ki sunti hai
Jo yahan maaldaar hai sahib

Loot kar woh zaroor aaye ga
Toote dil ki pukaar hai sahib

Lams se qabl sochna hoga
Saath gul ke to khaar hai sahib

Ab dikhaane lage wahi aankhein
Jin pe mera udhaar hai sahib

Aman qaaim to ho nahi sakta
Dil mein jab tak daraar hai sahib

Daal de ga kabhi halaakat mein
Yeh jo main ka khumaar hai sahib

items.title: Rote hue ko yaar hansaana, yeh Islam sikhaata hai
items.content:
Rote hue ko yaar hansaana, yeh Islam sikhaata hai
Bhatke hue ko raah dikhaana, yeh Islam sikhaata hai

Jin shaakhon pe nafrat dekho yaaro aisi shaakhon ko
Kaat ke un ko aag lagaana, yeh Islam sikhaata hai

Jo hai dushman mazloomon ka aur sitamgar insaan ka
Is ko mitaane mein mit jaana, yeh Islam sikhaata hai

Koi na chhota aur bada hai sab hain Allah ke bande
Sab se dil se haath milaana, yeh Islam sikhaata hai

Jaati hai to jaaye apni, jaan bachaana auron ki
Khud se pehle paani pilaana, yeh Islam sikhaata hai

Raah mein gar ho kaanta patthar nazrein bacha kar mat jaana
Pehle ruk ke us ko hataana, yeh Islam sikhaata hai

items.title: Charaagh-e-mohabbat yun jalne ka na hai
items.content:
Charaagh-e-mohabbat yun jalne ka na hai
Ke jab tak tera dil badalne ka na hai

Sahaara de apne deewane ko aa ke
Kisi aur se yeh sambhalne ka na hai

To jab tak kare ga na iqraar sun le
Deewana tere dar se talne ka na hai

Hum hi hain jo nakhre uthaate hain tere
Kisi aur ke paas chalne ka na hai

Talaashi lo ghar ki bade, shauq se tum
Koi bomb ya khanjar nikalne ka na hai

Khuda ko tu mehboob tab tak na hoga
Takabbur ko jab tak kuchalne ka na hai

Nayi nasl ki chaahtein bhi nayi hain
Khilonon se ab yeh behalne ka na hai

Khuda ki inaayat hai mujh naatawaan pe
Sitam se yeh Saani dahalne ka na hai

items.title: Bahut aasaan hai ghar ko jalaana
items.content:
Bahut aasaan hai ghar ko jalaana
Bahut mushkil hai lekin ghar banaana

Chalein ge chaandni shab mein tahlne
Mere humraaz hamdam aap aana

Bahut mehnga pade ga tum ko ek din
Kisi majboor ke dil ko dukhaana

Wafa hargiz na karna meri maano
Dikhawe ka hai yeh aalam suhaana

Ameer-e-shehr ek jaahil bana hai
Hunar Saani sambhal kar tum dikhaana

items.title: Main yahan dhoondta hi raha aur kuchh
items.content:
Main yahan dhoondta hi raha aur kuchh
Tha muqaddar mein lekin likha aur kuchh

Aa gaya bhaayi jab ghair ki baat mein
Hoga kya is se badh kar bura aur kuchh

Aap ko jaana hai jaaiye bazm se
Mujh ko to hai abhi dekhna aur kuchh

De raha hai tasalli maseeha mujhe
Keh raha hai magar aaina aur kuchh

Is liye faasla darmiyaan ho gaya
Main ne bola tha kuchh sun liya aur kuchh

Dil jigar jism jaan ishq mein de diye
Tha taqaaza magar ishq ka aur kuchh

Zindagi aa gayi aakhri mod pe
Chhod Saani yahan sochna aur kuchh

items.title: Hamaari tarah wafa tum bhi kar sakoge kya
items.content:
Hamaari tarah wafa tum bhi kar sakoge kya
Bhanwar mein ishq ke bolo utar sakoge kya

Yeh ishq ishq hai koi hansi mazaak nahi
Yeh raah kaanton bhari hai guzar sakoge kya

Ameer-e-shehr se tera hai khoon ka rishta
Ghareeb khaane mein mere thehar sakoge kya

Hamein sataaoge tadpaaoge rulaaoge
Ameer-e-shehr ho tum aur kar sakoge kya

Badan ke zakhm sabhi mere bhar to doge tum
Tabeebo zakhm-e-jigar mera bhar sakoge kya

Khuda ne bakhshi mujh ko udaan hai Saani
Paron ko mere bhala tum katar sakoge kya

items.title: Tera deewana bhala aur kidhar jaaye ga
items.content:
Tera deewana bhala aur kidhar jaaye ga
Chhod ke dar ko tere kaun se dar jaaye ga

Koi naqqaad agar naape paimaane par
Jitna shiraaza hai lafzon ka bikhar jaaye ga

Kal woh roye ga mujhe chhod ke jaane waala
Jab raqeebon ki nigaahon se utar jaaye ga

Apne aangan ka shajar kaatne waalo socho
Shaam ko lota parinda to kidhar jaaye ga

Jis ke kehne pe jahaan bhar se baghaawat kar li
Kya khabar thi ke zamaane se woh dar jaaye ga

Apne imaan pe mazbooti se rehna Saani
Fitna toofaan sa hota hai guzar jaaye ga

items.title: Khumaar is aankh ki teekhi sharaab ka na gaya
items.content:
Khumaar is aankh ki teekhi sharaab ka na gaya
Mere khayaal se chehra woh chaand sa na gaya

Tumhaare pyaar ne pairon mein baandh di bedi
Main ja raha tha yahan se magar chala na gaya

Tamaam umar bhatakta raha talaash mein par
Tere nagar ke liye koi raasta na gaya

Main is liye chala aaya teri mehfil se
Zabaan-e-ghair se charcha tera suna na gaya

Saza mili hai hamein aise dil dukhaane ki
Kisi pe hans liye itna ke phir hansa na gaya

Mizaaj milta bhi un se to kis tarah Saani
Wafa parast tha main be-wafa bana na gaya

items.title: Tum jo tanhaayi mein aa baithe ho
items.content:
Tum jo tanhaayi mein aa baithe ho
Kya koi rog laga baithe ho

Husn ki tum ne jo paayi daulat
Sab ko deewana bana baithe ho

Khud ko kehte ho bade daana tum
Dil magar apna ganwa baithe ho

Ab tamaashaayi bane gi duniya
Haal nadaan ko suna baithe ho

Nabz bhi thamne lagi hai meri
Aur tum ho ke khafa baithe ho

Saari duniya ko jalan hone lagi
Mere pehlu mein jo aa baithe ho

Gum hai seene se mera dil Saani
Kya kahein aap chhupa baithe ho

items.title: Dil mein tha is ke aur na is ke jigar mein tha
items.content:
Dil mein tha is ke aur na is ke jigar mein tha
Jo kuchh bhi tha kamaal woh is ki nazar mein tha

Manzar bayaan kaise karoon sochta hoon main
Sooraj ka ek gulaab sa tasht-e-sahar mein tha

Naakaamiyon ka apni sabab ka pata chala
Dushman ka raazdaar to apne hi ghar mein tha

Aasaan tum samajhte ho aana yahan mera
Maaloom tum ko kya hai ke kab se safar mein tha

Kaise chhupaata khud ko bata aye mere sanam
Apni wafa ka zikr har su nagar mein tha

items.title: Soch kar yeh mera dil dahalne laga
items.content:
Soch kar yeh mera dil dahalne laga
Raasta kyun bhala woh badalne laga

Ek muddat se patthar bana jo raha
Ishq ki chot se woh pighalne laga

Jab tadap kar dua ek maan ne hai ki
Phir to sehra bhi paani ubalne laga

Dushmanon mein mere khalbali mach gayi
Jab diya mera toofaan mein jalne laga

Tum nikal aao maazi se Saani kabhi
Shaam ka ab to sooraj bhi dhalne laga

items.title: Fitrat nahi badalti hai insaan kya kare
items.content:
Fitrat nahi badalti hai insaan kya kare
Jis ka dagha hai kaam woh kaise wafa kare

Seene mein is ki aag lagi ko bujhaaye kaun
Khushhaali dekh kar jo kisi ki jala kare

Saail sabhi ke khair mein karta raha dua
Allah do jahaan mein sab ka bhala kare

Hai yeh mere padosi ka mehboob mashghala
Dekhe kahin sharaara to us par hawa kare

Main maangta hoon Rab se duaaein yeh subh o shaam
Aisa kabhi na ho ke woh tark-e-wafa kare

Saani main iska kyun na karoon dil se ehtiraam
Be-laus doosron ki jo khidmat kiya kare

items.title: Dil mera saaz-e-mohabbat pe chehak leta hai
items.content:
Dil mera saaz-e-mohabbat pe chehak leta hai
Tera deewana hai masti mein tharak leta hai

Muflisi mulk se jaaye bhi to jaaye kaise
Haq ghareebon ka yeh neta hi satak leta hai

Is se badh kar ke ghalat haal-e-chaman kya hoga
Aabroo phool ki maali hi uchak leta hai

Yeh bhi haalaat se ek tarah baghaawat hi to hai
Jis ko maidaan mein hona tha dubak leta hai

Dard hota hai to ho jaata hai chehre se ayaan
Phool jab shaakh pe khilta hai mahak leta hai

Daastaan-e-gham-e-dil kis ko sunaaoon Saani
Jo bhi sunta hai wahi sun ke khisak leta hai

items.title: Be-wafa ko ba-wafa kaahay kaho ho
items.content:
Be-wafa ko ba-wafa kaahay kaho ho
Na Khuda ko tum Khuda kaahay kaho ho

Tum to waaqif nahi is aadmi se
Is ko achha ya bura kaahay kaho ho

Kar ke mujh se be-wafaayi jo gaya hai
Is ko mera ab bhala kaahay kaho ho

Hosh mein aa re deewane hosh mein aa
Zulf-e-naagin ko ghata kaahay kaho ho

Saahib-e-masnad ne yeh e’laan kiya hai
Tum gadhe ko bhi gadha kaahay kaho ho

Sab ka hai Hindustan sab ka rahe ga
Sirf apne baap ka kaahay kaho ho

items.title: Tujh ko ruswa na karoon ga main yeh sar jaane tak
items.content:
Tujh ko ruswa na karoon ga main yeh sar jaane tak
Meri koshish yahi hogi mere mar jaane tak

Aaina aaina hai aaina sach bole ga
Sang maaro bhale is ko bikhar jaane tak

Main tumhaara hoon tumhaara hi rahoon ga dilbar
Jaanch lena meri saanson ke thehar jaane tak

Aandhiyaan dekh mujhe tu na dara paaye ga
Main teri raah mein hoon tere guzar jaane tak

Aasmaan pe hi nazar rehta hai is ka har dam
Aakhri par bhi parinde ka katar jaane tak

Azm Saani ka bhi dekhe ga yeh darya maghroor
Kashti chhodoon ga na nirghe se abhar jaane tak

items.title: Teri yaadon mein lipti hui tar hawa
items.content:
Teri yaadon mein lipti hui tar hawa
Aati rehti hai mujh ko barabar hawa

Jhonpdi kya haweli bhi tak na sake
Gar badalne lage apne tewar hawa

Jab fazaaon mein pheli ho aaloodgi
Phir mayassar kahaan se ho behtar hawa

Chal rahi itra itra ke us roz se
Jab se aayi hai un ko yeh chhoo kar hawa

Bhool jaaun use jab bhi socha kabhi
Is ki yaadon ke le aayi lashkar hawa

Shukr hai azm mera salaamat raha
Yun to aayi daraane ko aksar hawa

Woh bhi be-chain hai Saani tere baghair
Bas abhi guzri hai mujh se keh kar hawa

items.title: Ehd-e-haazir ka aisa sukhanwar hai tu
items.content:
Ehd-e-haazir ka aisa sukhanwar hai tu
Is jahaan-e-sukhan mein tu faani nahi

Mir o Ghalib ka ek husn-e-badal
Tu hai Saani magar tera saani nahi

Tauheed Azhar Pooranvi

items.title: Har ek sher, ghazal ko, har ek kahaani ko
items.content:
Har ek sher, ghazal ko, har ek kahaani ko
Likha hai jis se qalam ki usi rawaani ko

Meri dua hai ke mehnat yeh unki rang laaye
Khuda qubool kare yaaro aks-e-Saani ko

Sahib Khan Sagar

items.title: Poora dil ka hua armaan yaaro
items.content:
Poora dil ka hua armaan yaaro
Saani ka aa gaya deewaan yaaro

Is mein basi meri jaan yaaro
Saani ka aa gaya deewaan yaaro

Urdu ke lafzon se is ko sanwaara
Hindi ka bhi to liya hai sahaara

Donon zabaan is ki shaan yaaro
Saani ka aa gaya deewaan yaaro

Ghazlon mein iski ghazab ki rawaani
Har sher mein hai mukammal kahaani

Is ki yahi pehchaan yaaro
Saani ka aa gaya deewaan yaaro

Urdu adab ke woh ahl-e-nazar hain
Ustaad sahib to unke samar hain

Ilm o hunar ki hain khaan yaaro
Saani ka aa gaya deewaan yaaro

Hua yeh jahaan mein jo mutabar hai
Dada Mazhar ki dua ka asar hai

Rab ne ata ki yeh shaan yaaro
Saani ka aa gaya deewaan yaaro

Mehnat yeh Saani ki woh rang laayi
Deta hai har koi dil se badhaayi

Peechhe rahe kyun Imran yaaro
Saani ka aa gaya Saani deewaan yaaro

Imran Dhampuri
